If you're a fan of the original game or any of its previous sequels, you'll appreciate the inclusion of familiar faces like Benimaru Nikaido, Shingo Yabuki, and two Kyo Kusangi look-alikes, as well as a bunch of new fighters, such as K' and Maxima. The combatants are divided into seven teams, with four fighters joining forces to take down the other groups. If you're in trouble, you can slip into Armor mode for a few moments in order to fend off your opponents, or rely on brilliant "desperation" moves that will occasionally turn the fight around with the push of a button. There are plenty of options to spice things up in this brilliantly involving take on the popular fighting genre. Play alone or challenge a friend.
title: The King of Fighters '99: Evolution

description: They're not just for transportation anymore. The popular razor scooters now have their own video game, and it's one intense ride. Choose your rig from a variety of available scooters, and then head out to rescue your friends. It seems an evil robot named Norton has kidnapped all your pals, and only your razor style and skills can save the day. There are 10 cool characters to play as each with unique abilities and shortcomings and 45 cool maneuvers to pull off. Packed with awesome graphics and realistic action, RAZOR FREESTYLE SCOOTER uses the game engine popularized by GRIND SESSION to deliver the ultimate extreme sports gameplay. Each level is loaded with difficult obstacles and hidden bonuses, and the controls are refreshingly simple to learn. If you're looking for a great take on this popular new sport, you've found it. Play alone or take on a friend.
title: Razor Freestyle Scooter

description: The Fiji Islands are some of the best places in the world to find expert surfers tearing up the waves, but CHAMPIONSHIP SURFER for the Dreamcast will take players to a mysterious undiscovered island just east of Fiji, where the surf is more challenging than anywhere else! Choose one of eight different characters, grab a board and enter the Championships, where you'll pull off all kinds of crazy tricks on huge waves that boggle the mind or swallow lots of salt water trying! Some of these areas have mysterious obstacles floating in the water that will put your surfing skills to the test--the threat of sharks is very real. These are untamed waters, after all  with waves very few surfers will dare to ride! You can also take on your friends for a quick rumble on the waves, just to find out who the "King of the Beach" really is!
title: Championship Surfer

description: If you thought Chessmaster 7000 was good, be prepared to be stunned. CHESSMASTER 8000 improves on this proud tradition with several new and improved features. The chess engine has been revamped, making it the most powerful available yet for the PC in 16-bit graphics. Also features natural language advice, offering tips in easy-to-understand English geared for kids. The exclusive Match the Masters feature is by noted chess author and teacher Bruce Pandolfini for extra fun.
title: The Chessmaster 8000

description: Torneko is back! The roly-poly shopkeeper from Dragon Warrior IV returns in his very own dungeon-crawling adventure. You play as the rotund merchant, who has aspirations of becoming the greatest shopkeeper in the kingdom. In order to obtain the finest and most precious items in the land you'll venture deep into dangerous dungeons, face terrifying enemies, and use powerful magic. You'll need to use clever strategy and your strongest weapons to battle Trolls (with spiked clubs and horrible breath), Slimes (weak but plentiful), Lava and Icemen, Little Devils (with Babyfork swords that allow them to steal items from you), vomiting Zombies (ugh!), Dragons and more. You're aided in your hack-and-slash quests by your loving, pie-baking wife Nina and your feisty five-year-old son Paulo. A swelling soundtrack plays as you fight and explore, with a different theme for each dank dungeon. The graphics are charming, and the more than 150 characters and monsters have been designed by DRAGONBALL creator Akira Toriyama. View humorously animated Claymation cutscenes and backgrounds as you gather up over 100 unique items. TORNEKO: The Last Hope for the PlayStation is combative comic mischief for role-playing fans everywhere.
title: Torneko: The Last Hope

description: In WALT DISNEY WORLD'S MAGICAL RACING TOUR, the competition is fierce and the action non-stop. Something has gone terribly wrong in the wonderful world of Disney and it's up to you to put it right! That playful twosome, Chip and Dale, have accidentally sabotaged the magical fireworks machine, and in order to repair it they must speed through Disney attractions searching for missing parts. You take control of either one of the clumsy chipmunks (or a large selection of other Disney characters like Jiminy Cricket) and compete in bumpy, high-speed kart races across varied locales like Splash Mountain, Pirates of the Caribbean, Big Thunder, and the Jungle Cruise. Collect power-ups for speed blasts and special attacks, avoid tire-slowing traps, and drive over boost plates for an extra shot of swiftness. As you race you can listen to a classic soundtrack of favorites like "A PIRATE'S LIFE FOR ME" as you go barreling along. So wish upon a falling star and your racing dreams just might come true in the turbo-charged kart racing madness of WALT DISNEY WORLD'S MAGICAL RACING TOUR.
title: Walt Disney World Magical Racing Tour

description: The BUST-A-MOVE series makes its first appearance on the PlayStation 2 with SUPER BUST-A-MOVE, which retains the play mechanics of the earlier games in the series. Rows of bubbles line the top of the screen; at the bottom is a dial that can be move left and right. Players must fire bubbles from the dial to the top of the screen. When three or more bubbles come into contact, they explode, while the bubbles they were holding up drop to the ground. Much like SPACE INVADERS, all of the bubbles will move down a row at certain intervals, and when a bubble crosses the line near the bottom of the screen the game is over. If you are looking for a real challenge, play a friend in a head-to-head match up. Fans of BUST-A-MOVE will have something to cheer about with SUPER BUST-A-MOVE.
title: Super Bust-A-Move

description: EA SPORTS, now in the tenth year of an exclusive partnership with the PGA TOUR and continuing its partnership with Tiger Woods, delivers a realistic golf simulation for PC golfers and an emotion filled 18 holes on the PlayStation 2 computer entertainment system.  PC golfers will experience an accurate golf simulation, with realism and depth including: the exclusive license to the 2000 President?s Cup, easy-to-read putting greens, real-time swing synchronization, a golf course editor, in-depth Internet play, real PGA TOUR pros and highly accurate golf ball physics.
title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2001

description: The GRINCH hates Christmas, but the Who's of Whoville love it. To get even with the Who's that torment him, the Grinch decides to steal Christmas. You take on the role of the grumpy green creature as you try to ruin things for the citizens of Whoville. You must try to get through 29 missions that call for you to destroy the presents that are scattered throughout the level, as well as collect pieces of blueprints for new inventions. When all of the blueprints are collected, you can build a new contraption and use it in future missions. While sneaking around Whoville you can run, jump, and spew your noxious breath. You'll also have to use your dog Max to get into areas that are too small for you to get into. And don't forget to watch out for the Who's that use their greatest weapon against you   hugs.
title: The Grinch

description: Jump on a motorcycle and beat up the competition in ROAD RASH. You must race 15 other competitors to the finish line, but there's a catch: your opponents are equipped with weapons including chains, clubs, and pipes, and they have no problems using them on you when you get too close. Luckily, you can kick to get rid of these guys, or you just might be able to catch one and steal his weapon. Keep in mind, though, that the cops are patrolling and will not hesitate to pull you over. By placing in the top three of any race, you will be awarded some cash to spend on new bike parts or a whole new motorcycle. If your friends want to join the brutal action, they can with the Link Cable mode. Are you tough enough to take out the competition in ROAD RASH?
title: Road Rash
platforms: GBC Gen Sega-CD GG GB SMS

description:
It is a cold, dark, rainy day. With the memorial service for Lara Croft over, her old friends retire to the Croft Mansion, where Lara's friends gather to reminisce about her little known past exploits...

Tomb Raider: Chronicles reveals four newly discovered, and previously untold adventures of danger-seeker Lara Croft. As each memory is told by her friends, players leap into the story as Lara to play through these adventures. Search for items and solve puzzles in Rome, an abandoned Russian submarine base, a haunted house, and a high-tech office building. Utilize new nimble moves, like tightrope walking, parallel bar swinging and a hand-to-hand stealth attacking. Create your own adventures for Lara, with the Tomb Raider level editor, including a tutorial plus all the tools required to construct. Now you can relive the past and help the memory of Lara Croft live forever.
title: Tomb Raider Chronicles
platforms: PC Mac PS PSP DC PS3

description: Put your hand on the throttle and earn your wings with Harley-Davidson: Wheels of Freedom. The look, the feel, even the sound of the classic road machine is all here at your fingertips. Harness the thrilling power of an American legend as you race in a wide range of rally events around the country. Compete against the roughest and toughest competitors in the Open Road Challenge, Checkpoint Rally, Poker Run and more. Ultra-realistic 3D graphics and on- and off-road action get you away from it all. Ride the Wheels of Freedom and embark on the most exciting road adventure yet!
title: Harley-Davidson: Wheels of Freedom
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description:
Seven Games of the Soul is a 3d fantasy adventure game where you play as the role Marcellus Faust, an old wise man from Mississippi. Faust is the last guard of Dreamland, an unused theme park. Mephisto, an aristocrat demon appears on night. He is a supreme manipulator and tempter. Cross the frontiers of time to investigate the park's strange past and its most unusual inhabitants. Discover their dark secrets as you attempt to solve the seven mysteries which haunt these walls.

In a graphically awesome atmospheric setting, Seven Games of the Soul has an immersive soundtrack of UNIVERSAL hits including Marvin Gaye, Billie Holiday, Stan Getz and John Lee Hooker.
title: Seven Games of the Soul

description: Have you ever dreamt of creating the most incredible roller coaster known to man? Not only can you build the coaster of your dreams, you can actually ride it! Choose to construct a wooden, steel, or steel inverted ride, and then use 20 unique pieces to put together the sort of gargantuan thrill ride that will keep the kids hopping back in line. Place mountains, trees, plants, and other environmental elements for your coaster to blast through, then sit back and enjoy the high-speed wonder that you've created. With such a wide range of options, 3D ROLLER COASTER DESIGNER is an amusement park junkie's dream-come-true.
title: 3D Roller Coaster Designer

description: When a vicious crew of aliens decides to hone in on Earth and do some damage, you're the planet's only hope for salvation. You'd better be in top form as you command a killer spacecraft out into orbit in hopes of rescuing humanity from unthinkable misery. Each of the eight stages in PROJECT S-11 poses unique challenges, and each setting is more harrowing than the last. Although you're going it alone in this one, there are four different types of power-ups hidden throughout the game to give the boost you'll need to survive and wipe out the terrifying extra-terrestrials. You'll benefit from a complete statistical readout that adorns the right side of your screen, keeping you abreast of all necessary information: your score, your ship's armor level, and the number of bombs you have stored up for combat. The game's fast-paced action looks excellent in full color, and the intensity of it will have you breaking a sweat before you're through the first level. Those aliens had better look out with you at the controls, Earth stands a fighting chance.
title: Project S-11

description: X-Plane is billed as the world's most comprehensive, powerful flight simulator with an incredibly realistic flight model. Players are welcomed to the world of props, jets, single- and multi-engine airplanes, as well as gliders, helicopters and VTOLs such as the V-22 Osprey and AV8-B Harrier. X-Plane comes with subsonic and supersonic flight dynamics, sporting aircraft from the Bell 206 Jet-Ranger helicopter and Cessna 172 light plane to the supersonic Concorde and Mach-3 XB-70 Valkyrie. The game includes 40 aircraft spanning the aviation industry and history, and several hundred more are freely downloadable online. An updated version of X-Plane was commercially released in 2004 by Tri Synergy.
title: X-Plane

description: This follow-up to SEGA's arcade Dreamcast music game. Version 2000 takes the basics from the original, features twice as many songs, and adds a few new ideas, such as the Hustle maneuver. The normal Samba play requires that you do one of the following: shake your maracas controllers in one of six positions relative to your body (sometimes fast, sometimes slow), or sustain an extended goofball looking pose with the maracas. So what's missing? How about a move that requires you to rapidly sway the Maracas between two of the positions? You'll hustle with one Maraca between the top two positions, and you'll turn to the side and hustle with both maracas between the top left and left-most positions. Originally slated for US release, this update was only made available in Japan.
title: Samba de Amigo Ver. 2000

description:
Guilty Gear X is the sequel to 1998's Guilty Gear, a 2D fighting game for the Sony PlayStation that became extremely popular in Japan. Featuring beautiful hand-drawn artwork and animation, as well as balanced, fun, high-energy gameplay, Guilty Gear X aspires to be the king of 2D fighters.

The goal in Guilty Gear X is simple: get your opponent's Life Bar down to zero within the allotted time to win. Winning a round nets you a point; getting two points will win you the match. There are 14 different characters to choose from, each with their own personal style and moves. There might even be some hidden ones, too...

Combining amazing graphics and deep play mechanics with an easy-to-learn control scheme, Guilty Gear X sets the new standard in 2D fighting games!
title: Guilty Gear X

description: Speed down the straights, get your knee down, and clip the apex of 12 tough tracks on the world's fastest bikes. Compete in single-player, two-player split-screen, or through the Internet with up to eight players.  Suzuki 2000 reigns supreme in the frienzied world of superbike racing.
title: Suzuki Alstare Extreme Racing

description: After the Hazzard County Bank is robbed, everyone immediately suspects Missy Law. But Missy is one step ahead of the game and has framed Daisy Duke for the crime. So you'll have to get behind the wheel of the General Lee as well as Daisy's jeep and Uncle Jesse's truck and foil Missy's plans in 18 missions of driving excitement. You must make big jumps, elude bad guys, and avoid destroying your car to succeed. Each mission allows you the freedom to roam across the back roads of Hazzard County as you search for shortcuts. If you don't want to deal with the cops or robbers, you can explore the local landmarks in the Joyride mode. It's up to you to save Daisy from prison in THE DUKES OF HAZZARD 2: Daisy Dukes it Out.
title: The Dukes of Hazzard II: Daisy Dukes It Out
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

description: A demonic trickster called The Joker has cursed Sumaru City, home to the Seven Sisters High School. His curse has the ability to turn rumor into fact, which causes all sorts of trouble. Gradually gruesome murders fill the land the school's principal happens to be one of the victims and all sorts of monsters and demons begin showing up. Maya Amano, a cub reporter for a popular teen magazine is on the case, and she's determined to get to the bottom of things. Maya and her party set out on an engaging RPG adventure filled with fun twists. There are huge, hulking monsters than can be outwitted and scared off rather than outfought, and an innovative rumor system that can trigger events that will create entirely new story arcs and let you get your hands on valuable objects. Sprinkled throughout the game are 80 personal summons, or magic spells. You'll meet stronger and more powerful foes the higher your levels of magic grow, until in the end it's down to you and the Joker.
title: Persona 2: Eternal Punishment

description: European rally racing has made its return to the PlayStation with COLIN MCRAE RALLY 2.0. For the uninitiated, European rally racing consists of racing one track at a time over several days, and the driver with the shortest total time is declared the winner of the rally. In this game, you have the opportunity to drive one of 13 different cars. When you are ready to race, you can play in the Arcade or Rally modes. Arcade pits you against five other vehicles in a Championship or Single Race, or you can compete for the fastest time in the Time Trial. The Rally mode has point-to-point races, and you can compete in Championship, Single Rally, Single Stage, Time Trial, and Challenge gameplay options. So strap yourself behind the wheel and get on the road with COLIN MCRAE RALLY 2.0.
title: Colin McRae Rally 2.0

description: Games don't get more classic than the original PRINCE OF PERSIA, which dates back to some of the earliest videogame systems ever made. With the power of the Dreamcast, we now get to see this ancient Arabian world rendered in full 3D. Of course, the many traps and enemies you'll encounter will be just as deadly to our hero this time around! The sultan's brother intends to take control of the kingdom from him, but in order to do that he needs to eliminate anyone who might be able to stop him and that includes you. Cast into the prison deep under the palace, players are faced with the task of escape: avoiding numerous traps, battling guards who've been ordered to kill you, and solving difficult puzzles. All of this will lead you to a final showdown with the sultan's evil brother, and the great reward of being immortalized as a hero!
title: Arabian Nights: Prince of Persia
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

description: MOTO RACER 3: World Tour continues the series' tradition of intense motorcycle racing on the PlayStation. But in this third edition things are much improved, both graphically and option-wise. The game supports one or two players, maintains the intuitive control system found in the previous MOTO RACER titles, and once again offers the awesome track editor. Once again, a wide selection of street and dirt racing bikes are available, as well as a number of simulation options, which makes MOTO RACER 3: World Tour the most complete game in the series. Unlike the random mix of fantasy and real-life tracks of MOTO RACER 2, World Tour features more than 30 distinct real-life racing locales. There are a number of gameplay modes that further enhance the MOTO RACER experience. In addition to the standard street- and off-road racing, you also get endurance and skill competitions.
title: Moto Racer World Tour

description:
Backstage Assault will include more than 800 motion-captured animations, including some 300 reused from last year's WCW Mayhem. EA boasts that the game's controls will be much quicker and more responsive than Mayhem's.

The exquisitely detailed wrestler-create feature even lets you specify holes in a wrestler's pants. EA is also touting the fully rounded wrestler-create option for females.

Developer Kodiak Interactive (which also made Mayhem) has also advanced the art of weaponry by implementing fatigue. For example, a two-by-four will crack the second time you whack a rival with it, then break completely the third time it's used. Kodiak is also busily concealing weapons in crates and other objects.
title: WCW Backstage Assault

description: The Mummy is Rebellion's third-person action adventure based on the 1999 remake of the classic horror film. Fans of the Tomb Raider series will enjoy the adventure elements of The Mummy, while action fans will remember that Rebellion also made the highly successful Aliens vs. Predator.
title: The Mummy

description:
Swing into action with the first-ever PS2 golf game from Electronic Arts in

. In all, six pro golfers take to the green on three real-life courses including SpyGlass Hill, Pebble Beach, and Poppy Hills as they swing and putt their way through exact replicas of all 18 holes. The varied modes of play are now supported by two new entries, Challenge and Play-Now, in addition to such returning staples as Match, Skins, and Stroke. Making use of the PS2's additional graphical capacity over its PSOne counterpart, the game also boasts fully-rendered 3D environments and players, as well as an enhanced analog control system that makes use of the PlayStation's Dual Shock 2 enhancements.
title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 2001

description: Put s rocket between your legs and hold on in DUCATI WORLD RACING CHALLENGE. Choose from over 40 customizable Ducati bikes, including past and present models, and then hit one of the eight unique tracks and lay waste to the competition. If you are in for the long haul, take on the Ducati Life Campaign. Play DUCATI WORLD RACING CHALLENGE and develop the skills to drive the world's fastest bikes.
title: Ducati World Racing Challenge
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description:
Blade is a third person action and adventure game that emphasizes melee combat and exploration through a rich world. Play as any one of four classes as you battle monsters and other opponents using a huge variety of weapons.

The Lord created Chaos, and divided it in two parts, the Light and the Darkness. He gave to them life and thought, and so were born the Spirit of Light and the Prince of Darkness. But the Prince desired to supplant his Father. With the power of Creation, he made an evil new being for the new Earth, and chaos and war followed. Effort was made by the spirits to close Earth to just its creations and stop the war, leaving mankind to contend alone against the darksome fiends. Only a hero wielding the Sacred Sword was able to defeat the creation of Darkness and bring hope to the land. But now, eons later, foul creatures are awakening from their dormancy, and spreading terror and destruction. The Darkness has returned, and the end is near. A new hero is needed, a chosen one who will wield the Sacred Sword, and destroy the Enemy forever...
title: Blade of Darkness

description: Stupid Invaders is an adventure that follows Etno and his four friends. They are trapped with him in a laboratory after crash-landing on Earth. Dr. Sakarine, an evil scientist has sent a hit man to capture the aliens for his experiments. You control five brain-dead aliens as they desperately try to fix their broken spaceship, avoid destruction at the hands of the dastardly Dr. Sakarine, and get themselves back to their home planet. Point-and-click your way across Stupid Invaders' strange and puzzle-filled 3D environments in a fast moving, chuckle-inducing journey to find your way home.
title: Stupid Invaders
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Language, Suggestive Themes

description: Betrayed, condemned to death, and now blackmailed by the very people you once honored and trusted with your life, you must venture to an almost forgotten star system. Your task is to destroy the Mafia clans controlling the Pandemia prison colony, and its surrounding moons, or die trying. Crime Cities is a fast paced action shooter/flight sim set in an awe-inspiring futuristic city where you live on the edge and can die in an instant.
title: Crime Cities

description:
EA's basketball powerhouse is back, and bigger than ever. Here are some of the new improvements this game will feature:

-Enhanced Chat & Match-up with the fast, easy-to-use Match-up System. Enter the online Lobby to set up a game, chat with friends, and more.

- Execute more realistic blockbuster trades with up to 3 teams and 15 players using the new trade interface.

- See player personalities and emotions come out on the sidelines and in game: Players argue calls, celebrate a key basket, encourage their teammates, and more.

- Back a defender down and then select from a number of different post moves such as an up and under, jump hook, and turn around and fade away jump shots. Feel the contact and battle for position, then finish off your defender with two the easy way.
title: NBA Live 2001

description: Star Wars Starfighter allows you to fly through a unique chapter of the Star Wars universe, piloting 20 realistic and accurately rendered 3D starships amidst a variety of 14 environments set in air and space. The game sets players on an epic journey that begins on the lush paradise planet of Naboo and continues through the climactic assault on the Droid Control Ship inspired by the motion picture Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace. Players are introduced to the three main fighter pilots through a series of intense flight exercises from each character's point of view. Regardless of whom they choose, however, gamers will be able to test their battle skills against more than 50 vehicles, including Trade Federation drop ships, battle tanks, droid starfighters and never before seen craft such as the deadly Protector, Scarab, and Dagger.
title: Star Wars Starfighter

description: Set in a crazed, alternate future of Hong Kong, Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix is the prequel to the survival-horror hit Fear Effect. You play as one of four deadly mercenaries on a team that's been commissioned to bring back the kidnapped daughter of a powerful Chinese executive. The action begins with Hana, Glas, and Deke the three main characters from the original game meeting each other for the first time. Soon afterward they meet Rain, a close friend of Hana's. Hana, Glas, and Deke are on separate missions to retrieve three objects, but before long they realize that they're involved in the same deadly plot. The action takes the foursome through Hong Kong, Hell's Kitchen in New York City, the walled city of Xi'an, the lost tomb of the first emperor of China, and in the end, to the mountain island of the immortals, Penglai Shan. Then, after lunch, things really get crazy!
title: Fear Effect 2: Retro Helix
rating_content: Blood, Gore, Animated Violence, Suggestive Themes

description: Fans of CANNON FODDER and action games in general will find a lot to like about this version on Game Boy Color. Lead a squad of rag-tag commandos through 72 richly-colored and detailed overhead shoot-¿em-up levels. Missions vary, but one good rule of thumb is to shoot first, and ask questions later! With a humorous edge added to the concept of war, this game oozes personality. You'll traverse snowy plains, dense jungles, and populated villages packed with enemies, and you'll be able to commandeer a variety of vehicles and weapons, all in the name of warfare. Improved enemy AI makes this game even more challenging than ever, and you can save the statistics and records of your favorite commandos as well as your progress through the game with the battery backup. Full-motion video and digitized sound round out the package to make this one of the most complete versions of CANNON FODDER yet.
title: Cannon Fodder
platforms: GBC Jaguar Amiga SNES ST Cell 3DO CD32 PC Gen

description: Get ready for some seriously hot hoops action in the three-on-three court competition of NBA HOOPZ from Midway. In the grand tradition of NBA JAM and NFL BLITZ, arcade-style gameplay is the order of the day. Select your team of three NBA stars and try to outscore the computer or up to three of your friends in frantic basketball madness. If you sink three baskets in a row you even catch on fire! Or make three consecutive double-dunks or alley-oops and watch as your whole team ignites. A simplified control scheme (with only four buttons to learn) assists you as you shake up the court, performing death-defying skyhooks and stylish underhanded swooshes. When you tire of the pros, simply create your own player or team: start with an NBA player template and alter height, weight, and other physical features until you've got the ultimate arena warrior. There is also a slew of mini-games to master like 21, Three-Point Shootout, Around the World, and 2-ball, and you can catch all the most exciting game moments in slow-motion replays. The court is always ablaze with action in NBA HOOPZ for the Dreamcast.
title: NBA Hoopz

description: ACTION MAN hits the Game Boy Color, bringing with him all of the smash-mouth excitement of the children's computer-animated TV series. In this single-player action game, you play as Action Man himself as he battles to end the latest scheme of his nefarious arch-nemesis, Dr. X. Battle through six stages of side-scrolling gameplay that take place in such areas as the jungle, the snowy mountaintops, and even outer space. To help your cause, you can collect a veritable arsenal of deadly weapons including guns, grenades, and more. Action Man also possesses several special battle suits that give him new powers and abilities; you'll have to choose the right gear to progress through some sections, and not all areas can be explored with one suit. Full-color, vibrant graphics display all the explosions and high-octane action. ACTION MAN is only compatible with the Game Boy Color.
title: Action Man

description: Enter a World of Arcane Magic, Supernatural Abominations, and Ancient Horror. A curse is unleashed upon the world. As Magnus Wolfram, a master of the occult, you are drawn into the drama of a dying family whose degeneration threatens the fabric of reality. A desperate struggle ensues as Magnus utilizes a deadly combination of forgotten magic and devastating weapons to counter the forces of chaos. Powered by the Unreal game engine, Clive Barker's Undying delivers a highly unique, thoroughly chilling PC game experience.
title: Clive Barker's Undying
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

description: Is your life totally disorganized? Do you lose track of what you need to do? Have you lost the phone number of the cutest guy in school? Get organized with MARY-KATE & ASHLEY: Pocket Planner for the Game Boy Color. Use the calendar to keep track of all those really important messages and never forget a phone number with the phone book. You can also write super-secret messages to your friends and beam them to another Game Boy Color. In addition to these features, several games have been included. You can help raise Mary-Kate and Ashley's dog, Clue. If you have a question, go to Ask Ashley, and she will check her crystal ball for an answer. If you are completely unorganized and need some help, run out and get MARY-KATE & ASHLEY: Pocket Planner.
title: Mary-Kate and Ashley Pocket Planner

description:
The country of Arulco has fallen under a new threat. Ricci Mining and Exploration, the company that ran Arulco's mines before the recent civil war, wants those mines back. The corporation has established a base in the neighboring country of Tracona and used it to launch a missile attack on Arulco. As an example, the unoccupied Tixa prison is destroyed. If their demands are not met, they are prepared to destroy the entire country.

Enrico Chivaldori, the man who helped liberate Arulco, has decided on a swift and devastating response . . . you. Your team of expert mercenaries must cross the border into Tracona, locate the missile base, destroy it, and get out alive. The fate of a nation is on your shoulders, but the power of battlefield experience is on your side.

This "expansion pack" to Jagged Alliance 2 is a stand-alone game. The expansion adds ten characters, ten weapons, twenty sectors, improved tactical options and artificial intelligence, six levels of difficulty and a campaign expansion editor.
title: Jagged Alliance 2: Unfinished Business

description: The History Channel WWII: The Battle of Britain features more than 30 single player missions from training, Instant Action, and Campaign missions beginning with the Evacuation of Dunkirk - Operation Dynamo: May 27th, 1940. The battle will continue with all the major air battles of the period and conclude with the planned defense of England against Operation Sea Lion, Hitler's plan to invade the English isle!
title: Rowan's Battle of Britain

description: The airline business is a tricky one, but with any luck, you'll be the next big thing in the industry. Build travel agencies, add bars, and create banks that can bolster the business of your airline in this detailed simulation. There are 16 different missions of varying difficulty levels, and the object of the game is to make more money than the three competing CEOs. There are a variety of tools and tricks to discover along the way in this 3D epic, and all of the action takes place within the confines of one small airport.
title: Airline Tycoon

description: Join the military and set out on the tactical mission of a lifetime. You'll need to make split-second decisions throughout the game deciding whether you want to deploy troops, stand pat, or turn and run. A comprehensive statistical interface will tell you if your health is being depleted or you're running out of supplies for your soldiers, and a status meter will represent each of your targets. The object of the game is to occupy territory, and that will mean fighting each battle to the end and capturing enemy troops whenever necessary.
title: Mayday: Conflict Earth

description: Konung is set in the "Chronicles of Time" universe. It is a strong RPG with some RTS and Adventure elements. The game goes beyond action-style role-playing and offers adventure-style gameplay with dozens of non-linear quests and a strong storyline set in the complex atmosphere of VII-century Scandinavia, the mystical "Land of the North".
title: Legend of the North: Konung

description: When the wicked rebel forces return to take over the universe, you're the high-tech pilot who's assigned to stop it. Choose your aircraft from a long list of combat-ready machines, and then take off into enemy airspace. Packed with intense dogfights, huge computer AI, and some of the most comprehensive levels you've ever witnessed, GIGA WING 2 is an aerial experience for the strong of heart. Brains are as important as courage, however, as strategy will play a key role in your success. The enemies are relentless, but awesome power-ups will give you unique abilities and immunities to help fend off your foes. Use an amazing arsenal that includes a Reflect Laser and a Reflect Force which sends opponent fire right back to its source. A Score Multiplier will have you achieving new GIGA WING heights, and awesome graphics will make you feel like you're 5,000 feet off the ground until, of course, you crash.
title: Giga Wing 2

description: Flight action game based on Zero Pilot: Fighter of Silver Wing (PS One) and Fighter of Zero (Dreamcast) -- but the US version reverses the roles and lets players control an American pilot defending the world from Axis attackers.
title: Iron Aces

description: Everyone knows that the kick of a kangaroo can be very powerful, but Kao has also got the skills of a champion boxer at his disposal as well. In KAO THE KANGAROO, players will help our hero escape the clutches of the evil Hunter, as he makes his way home to his native Australia. In addition to powerful one-two combinations and knockout uppercuts, Kao can hop, skip, and triple jump onto his enemies, knocking them out of commission. He'll need every trick in the book to make it through five fully 3D worlds and well over 22 levels (with hidden bonus stages), complete with challenging end bosses that want to keep Kao from getting home. Getting back to Australia won't be easy, but Kao will be able to speed up the trip with a number of vehicles, including hang gliders, motor boats, snowboards, and more!
title: Kao the Kangaroo

description: Anyone who's ever seen Warner Bros.' Marvin in action (usually against Daffy Duck in some sort of intergalactic battle) knows just how much fun this guy can be with his creative weaponry and never-say-die spirit. Well, this cool video game for the GBC is the first-ever interactive game that actually lets you play as the beloved Martian rather than fight against him, and the results are hilarious. It's actually a sequel to another Marvin-themed adventure for the GBC, called LOONEY TOONS COLLECTOR: Alert!, and the gameplay is similar; you'll help Marvin solve numerous puzzles and overcome all sorts of obstacles throughout the game's ten-plus levels of side-scrolling action. The object is to collect all of the necessary items before the other Warner Bros. gang catches you, and evading them won't exactly be a stroll in the park. Cool cartoon graphics and clever mindbenders abound in this stellar, GBC-only release.
title: Looney Tunes: Marvin Strikes Back!

description: In DARKSTONE, an evil monk named Draak has summoned a dark monolith to drain all the inhabitants of the world of their life force. With everyone out of the way, Draak is free to plunder the world. You are the only one who can stop him. Gather the seven shards of the Light Orb so you can face Draak in a battle to save the planet. Play as a fighter, thief, wizard, or priest as you battle 80 different enemies and use various fighting and magic techniques. Every game will be different thanks to the random enemy, quest, and topology system: in each game the map is randomly generated along with the enemy locations and what quests must be completed to beat the game. In other words, this system gives the game almost infinite replay value. Play DARKSTONE, and try to keep Draak from looting the world.
title: Darkstone
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

description: In the future the world is a very bleak place, where the major form of entertainment is the World Destruction League. The League travels throughout the world hosting competitions, in which the contestants try to blow each other to little bits while riding in tanks. You are one of the contestants, and can play as any of 12 competitors with unique tanks and weapons. Compete in 35 competitions in seven different arenas, each arena filled with buildings and other obstacles. However, you can create "short cuts" by blasting the obstacles out of the way. Throughout the game, you can use over 20 different weapons and four power-ups to destroy the competition. Will you be able to survive the competition of WORLD DESTRUCTION LEAGUE: Thunder Tanks?
title: World Destruction League Thunder Tanks

description:
An enhanced port of the classic NES roleplaying game. Inspired by the success of Enix's Dragon Quest game, Square decided to release a similarly styled role-playing game with a different theme for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The title, Final Fantasy, debuted on Japan's Famicom in 1987 to critical and fiscal success. Final Fantasy's storyline, which dealt in mythological archetypes and confusing time loops, was deeper and more engaging than the one that powered the original Dragon Quest. Square's RPG also established left-against-right turn-based battle and magic systems that have been copied by competitors ever since. The game was a phenomenal success and has spawned a series that, initially exclusive to Nintendo consoles, later branched out to Sony's machines and non-interactive formats.

In Final Fantasy, the tale begins when four young warriors, each possessing a Crystal, are summoned to bring the world back to a harmonious elemental balance. During their voyage, they discover a nefarious entity has created turmoil in the structure of time in order to take control of the world, causing the heroes to travel to places they never imagined possible.
title: Final Fantasy
platforms: WSC Cell WinPhone PSP MSX2 PS3 PS NES Wii

description: One of the most popular cartoons of all time finally gets a videogame with WOODY WOODPECKER RACING for the PlayStation. The game pits Woody and his closest friends (and enemies) in a race to the finish on levels that are inspired by the show itself.  There are nine different racers to choose from, each with a different vehicle and special attack. WOODY WOODPECKER RACING promises plenty of gameplay and includes with hidden tracks, numerous characters, and a Two-Player mode.
title: Woody Woodpecker Racing

description: The appropriately named Sega Smash Pack Volume 1, is a lesson in how to make a collection of our favorite games from yesterday. Spread out amongst every genre you can think of, the twelve titles to be had in this particular disc are strong examples of why the Genesis was such a force in the days of 16-bit. Practically void of any weak link in the entire set, sit back and marvel at this fantastic lineup: Altered Beast, Columns, Golden Axe, Phantasy Star II, Revenge of Shinobi, SEGA Swirl, Shining Force, Sonic the Hedgehog, Streets of RAge 2, Vectorman, Virtua Cop 2, and Wrestle War.
title: SEGA Smash Pack Volume 1

description:
Naval combat makes its glorious return in Age of Sail II. Portraying real-time naval warfare with a 3-dimensional, realistic sailing and combat model, Age of Sail II accurately illustrates the mighty Fighting Ships from 1775 to 1820. Battle the great navies of 11 nations for supremacy on the high seas!

Features historical sailing ships, a full carreer ladder, full floating 3D camera, over 100 historical scenarios, Lush 3D coastal landscapes, and multiplayer support for up to 16 players.
title: Age of Sail II

description:
Search And Rescue 2 (SAR2) is a simulator where the player takes control of a Dolphin HH65 helicopter. You will fly as a pilot, assigned to an American Coast Guard base, and experience the thrills and excitement of day to day search and rescue missions. As you progress in skill and rank, you will be faced with more difficult missions, and hazardous rescue attempts.

SAR2 will focus on realism in helicopter handling and general physics, as well as a realistic story line. There will be no combat scenes or scenes of meaningless violence and the primary goal and reward for you will be to save the lives of people in distress.

You will be able to play through a campaign scenario, with an unlimited number of randomly generated missions. Each of these missions will be part of your pilot's career history, and together they form a story flow, which will be recorded in your "Pilot's Log".

You can also choose to fly a single mission. Here you can define the kind of mission you want to fly, by setting the mission generation parameters, thereby enabling you to test your skills in certain weather conditions or mission types before taking on the challenge of the campaign.
title: Search & Rescue 2

description:
The first version of Electronic Arts' boxing franchise for the PlayStation 2,

allows gamers to play with 40 past and present champions. Various gameplay modes are comprised of Slugfest, Exhibition, and Fantasy Fights in addition to a comprehensive career mode that follows your created boxer from his beginnings all the way to the championship. Other extras include four women boxers, commentary by Al Bernstein, Max Kellerman, and Teddy Atlas, and more than 1000 new motion captured moves, three boxing styles, and various signature and specialty punches. Also available for the PlayStation One.
title: Knockout Kings 2001

description: Acclaim brings the fast and expensive Ducati motorcycles to the PlayStation with DUCATI WORLD RACING CHALLENGE. Take control of over 40 Ducati bikes, including past and present models. If you can't handle a stock bike, customize it to your specifications and then get in a quick race on one of eight unique tracks. For the more hardcore player, experience the ups and downs of the Ducati Life Campaign where you can take on League, Classic, and Challenge races. In all of the races, the high-resolution graphics will draw you into the action. Since all of the excitement is going to lure you into the Ducati Lifestyle, checkout the Ducati Museum and learn everything there is to know about Ducati Motorcycle. For most of us, DUCATI WORLD RACING CHALLENGE is the closest we will get driving a Ducati bike.
title: Ducati World Racing Challenge

description:
is a driving simulation game that immerses players in the experience of high-performance car racing. It aims to accurately recreate the feeling of driving at top speeds with high-resolution graphics and in-game physics that detect handling, suspension, and collisions.

also allows for air, weight, gravity, and resistance, and all of these must be factored in as players race towards the finish line. For added realism, Squaresoft garnered the licenses to such exotic car manufacturers as Porsche, Ferrari, and Mitsubishi, and have even given each of them their real-life interiors when playing from the "Driver's Eye" perspective. Developed exclusively for the PlayStation 2.
title: Driving Emotion Type-S

description: The Outforce is a traditional top-down RTS game, played across a battlefield situated in space. To simplify the control and strategy system, the player only have to control his units along a two-dimensional battlefield, with only cosmetic variations in depth. The battlefield is scattered with asteroids, gas clouds and spacial debris as well as space stations, trading posts and military bases, which are all part of an interactive environment that can be taken advantage of in the actual game play.
title: The Outforce

description: Put on some sunscreen and head to the sand for action in POWER SPIKE PRO BEACH VOLLEYBALL. Play as 20 different pros, including beach legend Gabrielle Reece. In addition to the professional competition, you can also experience playing in: Osaka, Rio de Janeiro, New York, Los Angeles, and other exotic locales. Play a Single Match to get some quick action, or try to win it all in the Championship mode. Remember, advancing through the Championship mode will teach you how to perform super moves that can give you a big advantage. If your friends give you a hard time about your style of play, kick sand in their faces with the Two-Player mode. If you think you have what it takes to spike your way to king of the beach, play POWER SPIKE PRO BEACH VOLLEYBALL.
title: Power Spike Pro Beach Volleyball

description: After his father is killed, the young lion prince Simba must travel through the jungle to find his life's path. Eventually, he will return home and claim his rightful place as the Lion King. On his journey, Simba must avoid such dangers of the jungles and plains as wildebeests and rhinos. When he encounters these enemies as a cub, his roar does little to scare them off. However, maturing into a majestic lion deepens his voice and makes the growl useful as a weapon. As he explores the nine levels, Simba will be able to collect a wide variety of items that will open several bonuses that include puzzles, mini-games, and movies. While the film was animated in 2D, Simba and his world are rendered in three dimensions, and the plot unfolds in cinematic sequences between each level. You've got to help Simba take his rightful place in DISNEY'S THE LION KING: Simba's Mighty Adventure.
title: The Lion King: Simba's Mighty Adventure

description: Accused of a shameful crime, Alleron must travel the world in search of Daria, who is the only one who can determine Alleron's innocence. He will travel through nine worlds in search of her. Along the way, he will also encounter over 30 different types of enemies. Luckily, Alleron is a warrior and can dispatch the enemies with his sword. Later, he will find new weapons and armor and will be able to get rid of the bad guys with bows. When the going gets really tough, Alleron can use magic to ease his burden. Will Alleron be able to find Daria? Will she actually be able to prove his innocence? Is there something really sinister behind all of this? Find the answer to all of these questions in WARRIORS OF MIGHT AND MAGIC.
title: Warriors of Might and Magic

description: All of the Looney Tunes characters have returned to the Game Boy Color, and this time they are preparing to race in LOONEY TUNES RACING. You can play as eight different Looney Tunes characters including Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Marvin the Martian, Wile E. Coyote, and others, each with specially designed vehicles. Once you have picked a character, get on one of the 10 tracks and race against three other characters. Since all of the vehicles have similar characteristics, the only way to gain a real advantage is to cheat. Luckily, there are 12 different weapons to use like homing pies, speed-burst rockets, bombs, and rain clouds. Try to become the king of the track with LOONEY TUNES RACING.
title: Looney Tunes Racing

description: Everyone's favorite mermaid is back on the PlayStation in Disney's The Little Mermaid II. Featuring elements of both Little Mermaid movies, this game finds Ariel and her human friend Melody on a mission to rescue Prince Eric and foil Ursula and Morgana's nefarious plot. Along the way, you'll have to find your way to Atlantica saving it from Ursula, conduct Sebastian's Orchestra, and escape from the castle. Recapturing the Trident from Morgana and searching for clues to your identity are also on the agenda. Everything unfolds with the help of over 30 minutes of footage from the movie. If you're a fan of The Little Mermaid or if you're just a casual Disney observer, you'll flap your fin with joy for Disney's The Little Mermaid II.
title: The Little Mermaid II

description: Last fall's Championship Motocross featuring Ricky Carmichael for PlayStation game console was widely heralded as the best motocross racer in the very competitive motocross category.  Now CMX is back with Championship Motocross 2001 featuring Ricky Carmichael.  Featuring 30 real motocross riders and freestylers, dozens of real tracks, real bikes, loads of tricks and combos, hi-rez graphics and an even more finely tuned RMD physics system, this is the only PlayStation game race fans need!
title: Championship Motocross 2001 Featuring Ricky Carmichael

description: You're on the fast track to fame as an extreme BMX rider! From humble beginnings in backyard dirt mounds, you've got to prove you've got the moves necessary to land sponsors, acquire better bikes, and ride at world famous BMX venues. In this extreme sports title in the tradition of Tony Hawk's Pro Skater, you've got to catch enough big air to pull off an insane amount of sick tricks and combos. Grinds, jumps, manuals... they can all be done with a control system similar to that of the Tony Hawk titles. Compete in the game's three modes, unlocking special features as you go. Do you have what it takes to be the next Dave Mirra?
title: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX

description:
Sega revolutionizes the world of console RPGs by taking its classic Phantasy Star series online! Your planet is dying. To escape, the citizens of your world construct two gigantic spaceships and strike out in search of a new home. Pioneer 1, the lead vessel, finds a suitable world named Ragol and sets up a settlement there. However, when Pioneer 2 arrives, an unexplained explosion rocks Ragol and destroys the colony. You are sent by your government to determine what happened.

You create a character by choosing from various classes and races, and proceed to explore dungeons and forests, hacking up monsters and finding items. Typical RPG elements such as experience levels, magic spells and new weapons abound. Real-time combat makes up the bulk of game play. The innovative and addictive online functionality enables you to interact with players from all over the world in the game's many exotic locations. Use the Dreamcast keyboard to type messages or use other in-game messaging systems. There is also a single-player mode.
title: Phantasy Star Online

description: America is a real-time strategy game set in the Wild, Wild West where you can undertake 30 different missions, each with 4 levels of difficulty. You control a group of people -- Native Americans, Mexicans, outlaws, settlers or American soldiers -- and attempt to lead them to prosperity and in order to do so, you will have to build armies, form alliances and treaties, manage morale and experience, use the land effectively and take advantage of their group's special abilities. Multiplayer mode enables you to join your friends to increase the fun!
title: America

description: Oni is a third-person 3D action/adventure that emphasizes hand-to-hand combat as well as gunplay. Inspired by anime classics like Ghost in the Shell and action thrillers like La Femme Nikita, you play Konoko, an elite agent on a quest to infiltrate and destroy a ruthless crime syndicate. You?ll fight through levels designed by architects, including a monstrous underground research facility and a towering 15-story police station.
title: Oni

description: It doesn't get any better than watching the superstars of the NBA battle it out on the hardcourt but you can have the next best thing, in ESPN NBA 2NIGHT. This pro basketball game uses the powerful Dreamcast hardware to recreate an NBA broadcast, where you are in control of all the action. The combination of trademark ESPN graphics and statistics, along with the play-by-play voice talents of Brent Musberger and Stuart Scott, will have you leaving it all out on the court, against some of the best players in the world. Play through a full 82-game season, beginning with practice sessions and a pre-season warm-up. If you're good enough, lead your team into the playoffs and take the NBA championship. Think your team could use a little help in the backcourt? Make your own superstar guard and draft him into your favorite team's lineup to see how he performs.
title: ESPN NBA 2Night

description: Colin McRae Rally 2 is the long awaited follow up to the original racing hit - Colin McRae Rally. Just as the original CMR raised the bar for rally racing games so to does CMR2. CMR2 offers several modes of play including arcade and simulation. Play in arcade mode dueling it out against the others around a course or stick to the more traditional championship mode with three different skill levels.
title: Colin McRae Rally 2.0

description:
Lace up your skates and get physical in

. Choose from 30 different NHL teams, including the new Minnesota Wild and Columbus Blue Jackets, and battle for the Stanley Cup. Play as or against 13 retired NHL legends like Mr. Hockey Gordie Howe, Bobby Hull, Phil Esposito, Marcel Dionne, and several more. Four new play modes including Tournament, ShootOut, Practice, and Draft combine with more than 1000 different player animations (five times the amount in the PlayStation version) and a brand new Shot Aim option that enables players the ability to control their shots during a back swing.
title: NHL FaceOff 2001

description: Evil monsters are out to destroy the world, and only one person can stop them is you! In this epic battle for control of the planet, you take the role of a member of an elite squad that is given the task of saving the world. After picking your character, you will have to fight waves of monsters that attack from the air, land, and sea. When you encounter one of the bad guys, you will have to decide what weapon to use: homing missiles do the job on airborne enemies, and torpedoes are effective against the underwater creatures. After selecting a weapon you can fire immediately to create some quick damage, or you can charge the weapon to make it more powerful. If you are afraid of getting hit while charging a weapon, you can strafe left and right to avoid enemy fire. Do you have what it takes to save the world? The only way to find out is by playing CHARGE'N BLAST.
title: Charge'n Blast

description: Race 11 authentic ATVs through six challenging events, including Cross Country Enduro, Stadium Supercross, and Freestyle Stunt. Careen off the dirt path and take on rocky hillsides, sandy deserts or deeply forested mountain trails in your dash to the finish line.
title: ATV Offroad Fury

description: ARMY MEN: Sarge's Heroes 2 blasts onto the Game Boy Color in a radical vehicle-based action game. In this single-player game, you'll charge through over 30 missions of top-down shooting mayhem that span the land, sea, and air. Varied objectives, like escorting missions, base protection missions, search and destroy missions, and straight-out attack missions keep the gameplay fresh. Choose from three different Army Men characters, each with their own set of vehicles. You can take the speedy approach with the lovely Vikki, or go for brawn with good ol' Sarge. Vibrant, detailed graphics ensure you'll never have trouble telling the Green Army from the Tan. Colorful comic book-style cutscenes help tell the story between levels. A password option enables you to continue your mission another time. ARMY MEN: Sarge's Heroes 2 is only compatible with Game Boy Color.
title: Army Men: Sarge's Heroes 2

description: As the name would imply, WACKY RACES for the PC is a truly zany title. The game, which is based on the cartoon of the same name, offers up some fast, and often silly, racing. Players can race one of the popular characters from the show, each with their own unique vehicle. WACKY RACES is a game that doesn't take itself too seriously, but it offers up some seriously fun racing.
title: Wacky Races
platforms: PC PS NES DC PS2 Cell GBC

description: Paper Mario is probably best described as an RPG platformer. Mario travels through various lands, from desert to rainforest, on land, water and air, platformer style, jumping on objects, breaking blocks, and uncovering hidden items. But he interacts with characters, enemies, and storyline development RPG style. The game begins as Mario sets out to save the Princess from the evil Bowser, who has stolen a magical artifact called the Star Rod and made himself invincible. Jealous of Mario's popularity and wanting desperately to be favored by the Princess, Bowser has kidnapped her against her will and taken her to his floating castle high in the skies above the land. Mario quickly finds that the only way he can beat Bowser and rescue his main girl is to retrieve seven Star Spirits, magical entities that grant wishes, and use them against his evil foe.
title: Paper Mario

description:
Ubisoft's personable and popular cartoon hero is back and more ambitious than ever in the PlayStation 2-exclusive re-imagining,

. Now in full 3D and blending humor, suspense, and blinding speed, Rayman must escape an intergalactic zoo by using the powers of his still-imprisoned friends to open the door to an even greater power to free them. Unique to the PS2 version of the game are a number of brand new stages, a harder difficulty level, and a progressive upgrade system that gives

a number of abilities not found in other iterations.
title: Rayman 2: Revolution
platforms: PS2 N64 PC PS PS3 PSP PS3 iPhone DC 3DS NDS

description: Mega Man returns for more wild action in MEGA MAN X5. This time around, terrorists have attacked an asteroid colony and turned off its artificial gravity. Now, it is up to Mega Man and his friend Zero to defeat the terrorists, turn the gravity on, and keep the colony from crashing into the Earth. The gameplay is what fans of the series have come to expect: Mega Man must use his blasters and bombs to make his way through eight levels of running, jumping, and shooting action. If you decide to play as Zero, you will have to use a plasma sword and some cunning to get through the same levels. In either case, the characters will have to face tough bosses that have unique abilities. Once a boss is defeated, Mega Man and Zero can utilize the boss's talents. Only Mega Man and Zero can save the colony and the Earth in MEGA MAN X5.
title: Mega Man X5

description: Tulio and Miguel swing their way onto your Dreamcast in GOLD AND GLORY: The Road to El Dorado. In fun-loving, adventure-filled gameplay based on DreamWorks' animated motion picture, you play as the bumbling but lovable con-men as they solve challenging puzzles, explore, and fight their way to the fabled city of gold. Follow along the path of the movie as you stow away aboard a conquistador ship, hack through jungles, and battle angry Spanish soldiers.
title: Gold and Glory: The Road to El Dorado

description: Say goodbye to the MEGA MAN of the past and prepare for the next-generation Blue Bomber. The improved MEGA MAN 64 bursts into a 3D world of RPG elements with an interesting story line thrown in for good measure. Our hero is on a discovery mission for the lost treasure called the Mother Lode. Along the way, Mega Man encounters not only rebel robots, but also a cast of characters with problems that inevitably thrust him into battles with robotic enemies and their gigantic bosses. With an ample supply of cinematic cutscenes and voice samples, MEGA MAN 64 is also jam-packed with Buster Parts, unique weapons, and plenty of special items to discover during your quest. Mega Man's friend Roll aids the hero in upgrading his weapons and abilities by getting parts from the Junk Shop, and then combining them into powerful abilities. MEGA MAN 64 lives up to its name and takes things to a whole new level.
title: Mega Man 64
platforms: N64 PSP PSP PS3 Vita PS PC Cell

description: Carnivores: Ice Age is the third part in the Carnivores series, with all the same hunting excitement, 10 new, terrifying prehistoric creatures, and more spectacular landscapes. Prepare for a chilling expedition through five realistic 3-D maps, including massive ice cliffs and vast snowy expanses. Familiarize yourself with the animals' behavior in observation mode. Choose from a barrage of powerful firearms and accessories, including radar, camo, and cover scent.
title: Carnivores: Ice Age

description: Steel Beasts is more than just another modern tank simulation.  This design effort goes further than any before to accurately model real world conditions and tactics but in a way to not overwhelm the novice, would be, tanker with a zillion key combinations and an overwhelming interface.  Beyond just realism and game play bonuses there are tons of added improvements!
title: Steel Beasts

description: Enter the daydreaming fantasies of a marauding kid, home alone in a empty house. Building his own Airfix models, equipping them with firecrackers and other homemade weapons, he takes the role of a World War 2 fighter pilot. The year is sometime shortly after the Second World War, and our hero has finally gotten a chance to prove his skills. The parents have gone astray and left him alone with his opposing forces. It's time for a miniature yet devastating battle between the real powers of this corner of imagination.
title: Airfix Dogfighter

description: Jump on your snowmobile and head for the stunt course in high style. POLARIS SNOCROSS the first snowmobiling racer to hit the N64 is a white-knuckle, powder-blasting action-fest in the tradition of EXCITEBIKE 64   only on skis! You'll ride on 16 licensed Polaris snowmobiles on a dozen different tracks (some which must be unlocked) in your super-speed quest for victory. Practice freestyle or compete in Tournament mode in a challenging cross-country event. Select from day or night settings, choose if conditions are snowy or clear, and head downhill in heavy SnoCross-maneuvering competition. Think the racing is too hard to master or too weak to threaten you? Never fear three leagues of varying difficulty are on offer. You can also customize your favorite Polaris snowmobiles by changing treads or switching out transmissions to fit your driving style. Bust out tricks like Nac-Nacs, No-Handers, and Supermans as you avoid pitfalls and blaze down icy ravines in the bouncing, snow-skewering gameplay POLARIS SNOCROSS.
title: Polaris SnoCross

description: Grab the controls. And hold on for dear life with the most electrifying, high-speed racing experience available on land, sea and everywhere in between. RC Revenge Pro delivers racing like you've never seen before. It's arcade RC action so intense you won't believe your eyes. Immerse yourself in the wild racing world with state-of-the art graphics. Kick into overdrive with over 30 super-flying vehicles, including the first-ever RC boats! Race and wreck in enchanting, movie-themed worlds - including Scary Haunted Houses, Futuristic Moon Bases, Lost Inca Temples, a Monster Invasion Zone, a Zany Cartoon World and an exclusive Pirate themed world! Blow away the competition with outrageous weapons like the Shock-Wave, Bouncing Mines and the awesome Ultimate Weapon.
title: RC Revenge Pro

description: The famous falling blocks are back! The world's most popular puzzle game returns with a few new twists in THE NEXT TETRIS: On-Line Edition. The action is relatively simple: on a playing field 10-blocks wide by 20-blocks high, different shaped pieces fall from the top of the screen and float down towards the bottom; your job is to turn each piece as it drops in order to form complete horizontal lines of blocks. As you fill in rows completely, they disappear but if your field fills up with pieces or if the time limit expires, you've lost the game. This concept is elementary, but highly addictive. NEXT TETRIS adds a few changes to the mix as well. "Multimino" pieces have been added, which contain different colored blocks within them. When these land the colors separate, and if they don't match the surrounding pieces, they fall down and fill in spaces below. These lines may fill up and disappear, creating a "Cascade," where as many as five or six rows vanish in succession. In addition to single-player Classic and Next Tetris, you can compete against a friend or head online where scores can be compared against worldwide opponents.
title: The Next Tetris: On-Line Edition

description: Everyone's favorite tail-swinging reptile returns in CROC 2 for Game Boy Color. This time, Croc is trying to track down his long-lost family. Unfortunately, it's not as simple as it seems for our little green buddy, because his arch nemesis Baron Dante is back and looking for a little revenge. In this one-player adventure, you take the rambunctious reptile through 12 all-new stages, which are packed with a variety of Dantini monsters and clever puzzles. You'll have to use your wits and skills to pass through each stage, which are broken into four areas each. Keep an eye open for crystals that can be collected to buy power-ups that will increase Croc's abilities. CROC 2 sports colorful, detailed graphics with high-quality animation, along with a password save function to preserve your progress on your quest to find your family. This game is only compatible with Game Boy Color systems.
title: Croc 2

description: All the bells, whistles, and sirens of the pinball games of yesteryear come to the portable system with 3D ULTRA PINBALL: Thrill Ride. This colorful title takes all the fast action of pinball and combines it with features that only a videogame can provide. The full-sized table features multiple screens of action, with all of the staples of pinball intact. Bumpers, ramps, stoppers, and flippers litter the table, along with a variety of special bonus chutes that will take you to one of several special pinball challenges. 3D ULTRA PINBALL is highlighted by brightly colored graphics, with excellent detail on the board and its various parts. The game also features realistic ball physics and gameplay elements, so don't bump too hard or you'll get a "TILT"! 3D ULTRA PINBALL: Thrill Ride will test your skills and push your reflexes to their limits.
title: 3-D Ultra Pinball: Thrill Ride

description:
The year is 2032 and as Konoko, an elite agent of the Tech Crimes Task Force, your mission it is to infiltrate a ruthless and powerful crime syndicate and end its threat once and for all. But as the mission progresses and good and evil become blurred, a dark disturbing past begins to slowly surface from deep within Konoko, exploding with frightening power! Thus begins

, a third-person 3D action/adventure that blends hand-to-hand combat and gunplay into a single futuristic experience. Developed by the famous team at Bungie Software,

boasts a sophisticated AI system and huge array of full-contact moves and firearm skills. Also available for Windows PC and Mac O/S.
title: Oni

description: Serve up some action as you take on your favorite classic Nintendo characters in this tennis challenge. There's never been more realistic tennis action on the Game Boy, as every possible detail is included. You can play in either Singles or Doubles mode, but don't expect it to be easy; the computer has some pretty good moves   for a computer, that is. You can choose from a number of characters initially, and even more become available as you unlock them. You'll need to achieve certain goals to do so, however, and that's no small feat. The more experience you gain through winning matches, the more skills and abilities your character will possess as attributes. You can use an N64 Transfer Pack (not included) to move your characters from the Game Buy to the N64, and you can get two-player action going (head-to-head or co-op doubles versus the computer) if you have two Game Boy Color units and a link cable. It might not be Wimbledon, but the again, Wimbledon was never this much fun.
title: Mario Tennis [2001]

description:
The first of its kind, Cyber Groove is an interactive dancing game that lets you put on your dancing shoes literally. You can dance or work out or just listen in to the fantastic music on this groovy dance sensation.

Are you ready to boogie down for the big bucks? This original challenge takes a page from arcade-style dance games, daring you to groove out to cool tunes. A list of moves will appear on you PC screen, and your task is to hit them all in the correct rhythm without taking a single misstep. The whole thing is set to an awesome soundtrack, and it's the perfect game to play with a friend. The dancing gets faster and faster as the competition progresses, so make sure you're ready to work up a sweat if you plan to get anywhere in this entertaining contest.
title: Cyber Groove

description: Sudden Strike is a real time strategy wargame set in the battlefields of World War II. The game offers carefully planned Russian, German, French, American and British missions, totaling over 40 missions in three campaigns. The fantastic depth of the game, the infinite tactical possibilities and the excellent game-play outshines anything ever seen to date. Conquer the enemy's positions, land your troops on his shores, win the cleanup operations and call in paratroops or fighter-bombers for support.
title: Sudden Strike

description: The American way is no laughing matter, and Sgt. Rock is here to prove it to naysayers the world over. Help the leathery veteran make it all the way to enemy camp, then obliterate it in order to save the day and preserve U.S. ideals. Based on the arcade game FRONT LINE, this Game Boy Color update on the title features Sgt. Rock, a D.C. Comics hero. You must guide the war hero over rivers and through the woods, taking out enemy troops and tanks. The obstacles are bountiful, as you'll come up against heavy opposition at every turn. If you stumble upon an opposing tank, feel free to hop in just remember that even tanks can be destroyed if riddled with enough grenades. Featuring a solid, straightforward premise, and intense, combat-based action, SGT. ROCK: On the Front Line is sure to appeal to gamers, appreciators of war, comic book fans, and   wait, that covers everybody.
title: Sgt. Rock: On the Frontline

description: The evil computer hacker Techno has taken over the world's main computer system. Now, Mega Man must travel into cyberspace and stop him from wreaking further havoc. Unfortunately, Techno has been able to revive some of Mega Man's past enemies. The blue hero must work his way through level after level of action, using his trusty blaster to help him dispatch the enemies. Like the other MEGA MAN games, after defeating a boss character, Mega Man can absorb their powers to use against other characters. In addition to the boss abilities, Mega Man will find four other upgrades that will allow him to dash and head-butt, among other things. On each of the three difficulty settings, new enemies and parts of the plot are revealed. Try to keep up with Mega Man in MEGA MAN XTREME.
title: Mega Man Xtreme

description: If you like to play cards, then you should get a copy of HOYLE CARD GAMES. There is a total of 14 different games to play including six variations of solitaire (Four Free, Golf Par 6 and Par 7, Klondike draw 1 and draw 3, and Pyramid), Crazy Eights, Cribbage, Gin, Go Fish, Hearts, Old Maid, Spades, and War. When you play, you can choose from 14 different personas like a balding professor, a crocodile, and a teddy bear. You can also play against a friend using the same system or via a link cable. Now you don't have to worry about finding a full deck of cards when you want to play, thanks to HOYLE CARD GAMES for the Game Boy Color.
title: Hoyle Card Games

description:
Picture House of the Dead 2 with more typing and no light gun support, and you have a good idea what to expect from Typing of the Dead. Sega's latest game is a bizarre twist on the typical typing program, where, instead of having some woman named Mavis tell you how to type, you learn by blowing the remaining guts out armies of undead creatures.

Typing of the Dead requires the Dreamcast keyboard, and two keyboards may be used for the two-player mode. Word bubbles appear on screen, and you (and a partner) must type the word correctly to register a shot at the oncoming zombie army. While bizarre and almost dull sounding, Typing of the Dead is one of the best and unique Dreamcast games on the market. It's a great game anyone can get into and also just happens to double as a nice typing tutorial (if you can live with all the gore).
title: The Typing of the Dead

description: Your name is David Walker. You are a member of the Apollo XIX crew, your mission to collect information about unexpected seismic events detected upon the Moon's surface. It should've been a smooth routine assignment. As you near the completition of your task, the whole world goes berserk. Something kills your fellow crewmen, without warning, and apit is coming parently without much effort. And now for you.
title: The Ward

description:
Imagine a world in which post-WWII Japan is split in half between the Allies and the Soviets. As a leader of the Allied forces, the player must strategize, command, and fight with monstrous mechs and troops during intense firefights. Combining an intriguing storyline and the ability to be part of the action,

is one of the first strategy games available for the PlayStation 2 and offers eight different armored fighting walkers and more than 20 different scenarios for more than 50 hours of gameplay.
title: Ring of Red

description: Realistic terrain rendering using voxel technology, dirt flying everywhere, astonishing water splashes and waves, thunderstrokes, wind, leaves falling from the trees on collisions, accurate interaction between the car and truly different terrain types, incredible engine sounds and support for several force-feedback devices, crashes, skids and environmental sounds unlike anything you've heard before: Cabela`s 4x4 Off-Road Adventure will really put you behind the wheel !
title: Cabela's 4x4 Off-Road Adventure

description: NASCAR Racing 4 is Papyrus1 next evolution of the award-winning racing series. NASCAR Racing 4 showcases a revolutionary new 3D-physics model, designed by Papyrus founder, Dave Kaemmer, that adds realism to the reactions of the cars - with body rolls, the ability to become airborne, and tires that spin and lock up. The cars also feature a virtual 3D cockpit that allows you to look left and right, more dynamic arm and steering wheel movement - enhancing the immersive quality of the game. To further improve the quality of the gameplay, the interactive user interface includes widget sound, background music, and pop-up help for car setup and configuration options.
title: NASCAR Racing 4

description: Morgan Sinclair, a Secret Service Agent, has been charged with the mission to retrieve 4 artifacts, called Satan's Keys, from the Louvre Museum. These four keys, when joined together, cause complete global annihilation. Go back in time to three periods in time when various kings used the Louvre as their residential palaces: Charles V Mediaeval period, Henri IV Renaissance period, Louis XV 1789 French Revolution period, and return safely to present day. In this race again evil and against time, you as Morgan must find the keys before the vengeful descendants of an evil cult of Black Templars combine these mystic artifacts triggering Armageddon.
title: The Messenger

description: Not wanting to feel left out of all the fun, the characters from the Toy Story movies have acquired go-carts and are itching to race. You can choose from among 10 different characters including Woody, Buzz, Bo Peep, Hamm, Mr. Potato Head, and RC and hit the track. After you choose a racer, there are more than 100 different challenges waiting to test your skills. You can participate in a three-race series or try to master a single track, or for something different, try to collect as many items as possible, chase down the opposition, or destroy every other competitor on the track. All of this action takes place on more than 30 different racing environments that are full of shortcuts and dead ends. If you're ready for more Toy Story fun and high jinx with the whole gang, then you're ready for Toy Story Racer.
title: Toy Story Racer

description:
Nanoloop for Game Boy is a sequencer / synthesizer cartridge for Game Boy consoles. It allows to create electronic music without further hardware, using headphones or external speakers for sound output.

The idea of nanoloop is to simplify the stepsequencer concept as far as possible while keeping the gamesome, yet addictve character of loop-based music creation. The minimalistic graphical user interface was specifically developed for the Game Boy's small screen and has been optimized for keypad operation. Despite the simple design and usage, it provides access to the raw sound synthesis components and allows to create complex musical structures.

Nanoloop for Game Boy comes on custom cartridges, designed specifically for the needs of nanoloop, with robust and secure flash memory for data storage and, in case of ver 1.5, an extra oscillator for additional sounds.
title: Nanoloop

description: KAO THE KANGAROO has got the lightning-fast paws of a champion boxer, as well as the powerful hind legs of his species.
