Unfortunately, our hero has been kidnapped, and you must help him get back home to Australia. Use Kao's powerful legs to hop, skip, and triple jump onto and over his enemies, or deliver swift one-two combos and uppercuts with his pair of giant boxing gloves. Kao will need to overcome his enemies including challenging end bosses in five unique, fully three-dimensional worlds and over 22 levels. Kao will also encounter a number of vehicles, which will help speed him on his way home!
title: Kao the Kangaroo

description:
The destroyed "Alliance of Avares" must be re-established and you're the only one that can do it in JoWood Production's

. Jointly developed by the teams at Innoics and Planet 4,

is a futuristic real-time strategy game that boasts more than 60 fully animated units and buildings as well as an active terrain system that includes realistic reactions from environments based on snow, ice, desert, and grass. If violence isn't your way, however, you can also employ a myriad of diplomatic tactics to further your progress without firing a single shot, or team up with as many as eight friends with the multiplayer campaign option.
title: Thandor: The Invasion

description: If you think the greatest thrill in life would be making people throw up, then COASTER WORKS is for you. This game allows you to design and build unique roller coaster tracks from the ground up. You can place the track and bend it into the curves and twists of your dreams. Keep in mind though, that you must have lift hills or else your coaster is going nowhere. After getting the track set, you will need to test the ride to make sure the cars do not fly off of the tracks. When the testing is complete, you get the opportunity to have your ride evaluated and graded. Based on the speed, g-forces, thrill, and safety of the ride, people will scream, blackout, and throw up the more the better. Once you pass the evaluation, you get to start over again with more track and a bigger space   the only restriction is your imagination. Now you can build your ultimate scream machine with COASTER WORKS.
title: Coaster Works

description:
989 Sports' long-running b-baller makes its debut on the PlayStation 2 with

. Players sport thousands of motion-captured moves and the stadiums are modeled as closely to their real-life counterparts as possible.

also brings back the Create-A-Dunk feature made popular on the PlayStation 1 and refines the game's Touch Shooting and Passing controls. There's even a new and improved game engine, redesigned player mechanics, and a TV-style presentation that's been edited to include more camera angles, close-ups, zooms, and cut-aways. Team-specific playbooks with more than 450 plays designed by NBA players have been incorporated as well, with AI that read and react to your team's strategy.
title: NBA ShootOut 2001

description:
Sion is a bouncer in a Dog Street bar named 'Fate', but after an organized kidnapping by the Mikado Group's special forces draws him and his friends into an incredible battle beyond, the mean streets of the future are never the same again. Such is the premise behind SquareSoft's unofficial

sequel,

; which also happens to be the company's first PlayStation 2 videogame. In

, players will be able to experience action, adventure, and RPG elements as they fight their way through a specific storyline that provides different endings, cutscenes, and information depending on which character they use to complete it. Also notable because it's the first PlayStation 2 title that uses Dolby Digital 5.1 for its cutscenes.
title: The Bouncer

description: The first PlayStation 2 basketball title developed by Konami Osaka, ESPN NBA 2Night features 25 different dunks and 40 low-post moves for some of the most realistic hoops the home market has ever seen. Players can create their own athlete, decide his attributes, put him in the draft, and watch him develop into a superstar, or participate in the game's five different game modes which include: Practice, Pre-Season, NBA Season, Enhanced Season, and Tournament. Professional audio commentary is provided by ESPN personalities Brent Musberger and Stuart Scott, and the transition screens and display graphics are taken directly from ESPN's television broadcasts.
title: ESPN NBA 2Night

description: One of the most popular baseball titles of all time finishes its run on the PlayStation with this all-inclusive slugfest to mark its departure. All of the up-to-date (circa 2001) rosters, teams, and player stats are included, and the details are extraordinary. There's a jaw-dropping re-creation of the MLBPA Big League Challenge; a number of incredible mini-games that test your hitting accuracy and pitching prowess; as well as the requisite Home Run Derby. Create and draft your own big league stars, and use TRIPLE PLAY's Virtual Draft to field a team (watch out for the cap restrictions, folks!). Enjoy the game's Full Season mode, which lets you play as many of the 162 games in your team's season as you want to. There are tons of hidden secrets to unlock and bonuses for turning double plays, stealing bases, and more. If you're looking to add a baseball game to your PlayStation library, this one's an easy winner.
title: Triple Play Baseball

description: Aim for the fences and uncork your best swing for this installment of the popular HIGH HEAT series. Created in painstaking detail, the game has every field pattern, fence measurement, pinstripe, moustache, batting stance, and mannerism down pat. Choose your team and try to command a unified march all the way from the ceremonial first pitch on through to the World Series. Endorsed by Wilton and Vladimir Guerrero, HIGH HEAT BASEBALL 2002 boasts stunningly realistic player animations and up-to-date attributes circa the opening of the 2001 season. If you feel like getting a good warm-up in, try out Batting Practice mode, which lets you choose the specific pitches that are thrown to you so you can smooth out your gaps. With al of the teams and rosters of MLB here, the competition is heated and the crowd is ready for action. A comprehensive draft lets you bid on rookies to help preserve your team's future. Play alone or take on a friend.
title: High Heat Major League Baseball 2002

description:
Experience the unique adventures of Eike who is given the ability to travel through time, alter his fate, and prevent his own murder in

! Travel through changing time periods in nine chapters and and use clues from the past to solve puzzles and change the dire destiny that waits. With cutting edge graphics, full character voiceovers, multiple story paths and a riveting tale of mystery,

introduces the next generation of adventure games to Sony's PlayStation 2. Also available for Windows PC and Microsoft's Xbox.
title: Shadow of Destiny

description: The much-loved business simulation is back, and the strategy is even more serious this time. Scrapping the 3D graphics in favor of heavier options, the sequel has new vehicles and a whole additional set of business models to choose from. As in the original, you'll try to best your computer-controlled rivals by building and maintaining your own business. In this installment, there's a greater emphasis on production with more events that will take place over the course of a game. Infinite maps make for staggeringly high replay value.
title: Industry Giant

description: The war between the Greens and the Tans has escalated to massive proportions, and this time the action is more heated than ever before. For the first time in the series, each of the included vehicles is within your complete control allowing you to command tanks, motorcycles, submarines, boats, and more. It's all about the modes of transport this time around, as the little plastic soldiers have given up on the hand-to-hand stuff. There are 31 all-new levels to get you fired up, letting you wage war on land, above water, and under the ocean's surface. There are plenty of unique single and dual-player modes to keep you battling it out, and with 16 two-player scenarios in all, you're sure to develop some bad blood with your best friends. A Co-op mode, Grudge Matches, and the unique Steal the Bacon setup allow for maximum competition, and a Boot Camp gets your little green and tan man ready for battle.
title: Army Men: World War Final Front

description: This racing simulator is devoted to the world of Ducati bikes. Features include over 40 bikes, 8 tracks, multiple race modes, and upgrades. You can also learn the history of the Ducati motorcycle in the Ducati Museum.
title: Ducati World Racing Challenge

description: Feel each little wave, wake, and ripple as you speed through all sorts of waters on a super-powered jet ski. Choose your rider, and then take to a variety of realistic and far-fetched locations, such as the beaches of California and the icebergs of the Arctic. You score your points by grabbing balloons that are stashed in some hard-to-reach places; the placement of the balloons requires you to pull off extraordinary jumps and tricks to pick them up, making this as much a stunt challenge as it is a full-fledged race. There are lots of mini-games thrown in to keep things interesting, and to help you hone your skills for the real competition. Play by yourself, or take on a friend in a head-to-head match to find out who's fastest. The computer AI is very high, meaning each one-player race will be a real test of skill and maturity. Do you have what it takes to be the king of the waves? Hop on and find out.
title: Surf Rocket Racer

description: The diabolical Skorne has scattered the planet's powerful rune stones throughout the world so that nobody can use their powers to challenge his evil rule. Pick your character either the Warrior, Wizard, Valkyrie, or Archer and work with your party as you go on the ultimate manhunt. Fight your way through castles, deserts, temples, and forests and upgrade your weapons and powers as you collect money and experience. The action is fast and furious, but if you don't fight smart you'll find yourself right back where you started. But it'll take more than a powerful punch to get far, as there are a host of puzzles that will challenge your mind and might mean the difference between success and failure. Can you find the rune stones and use them to your advantage? It may be the only way to defeat Skorne, so gather your party and head into the great unknown on the most important journey of your life.
title: Gold and Glory: The Road to El Dorado

description: It's not just racing. It's a driving simulation so advanced and authentic it'll drive you mad. Comprehensive vehicle dynamics based on collaboration with industry engineers. Authentically licensed cars: Lotus, Aston-Martin, BMW, Alfa-Romeo and more. One of the most advanced 3-D driving engines ever developed. Is your mind ready for this much reality? VIVA LA SPEED.
title: Vanishing Point

description: Humorous action-platformer that does away with the tedious item collection found in most games in the genre. Instead, BFD employs a combination of standard jump, run and explore mechanics and context-sensitive gags and actions. For instance, in the beginning of the game, by pressing the B button on the first pad he encounters, Conker drinks some Alka-Seltzer to wipe out his hangover, at which point players can proceed forward. Later on these pads are used to activate a slingshot and throwing knives; to turn Conker into an anvil and drop downward; to shoot automatic, double-handed guns; to activate a The Matrix-inspired slow-motion effect and flip through the air shooting enemies; and much, much more.
title: Conker's Bad Fur Day
rating_content: Animated Violence, Mature Sexual Themes, Strong Language

description: If you loved NBA Jam and NBA Showtime, NBA Hoopz will be right up your alley! Midway presents NBA Hoopz, a three-on-three team basketball game. The game features every NBA team and their respective superstars. NBA Hoopz guarantees to serve up amazing high-flying, rim-bending action!
title: NBA Hoopz

description: If you're a fan of classic Loony Tunes cartoons (and who isn't?), then BUGS BUNNY & TAZ TIME BUSTERS could be just the game for you. Daffy Duck has broken Granny's time regulator and it's up to you to recover the time crystal, rescue missing pals, and save the day. Play as both Bugs and Taz, switching between them as needed, to win battles or pass obstacles. Bugs can high-jump, tunnel, hover and roll, while Taz offers brute-strength and his swirling tornado-spin.
title: Bugs Bunny & Taz: Time Busters

description: Are you crazy enough to go off-road with the true bullies of the demolition derbies? Choose one of more than 20 vehicles to take into competition against some seriously deranged foes. Enjoy awesome, 3D graphics as you try to bash your opponents into submission. There are no guns, bombs, homing missiles, or fireballs to help you out of this mess; you'll have to rely on good, old-fashioned strategy and strength. Up to eight players can get in on the derby via an Internet connection.
title: 1nsane

description:
The boys are back and ready to do battle in

! Sarge and the Bravo Company managed to foil the Tan Army's first assault, but do they have what it takes to do it again? General Plastro has teamed up with Brigitte Bleu, a diabolically treacherous Blue Spy, to destroy the Green Nation once and for all. The adventure continues as Sarge and Vikki fight their way over pool tables, under beds, and across desktops to the final showdown against Plastro and his troops. Exclusive to the PlayStation 2 version of the game, players will be able to control Vikki in addition to the Sarge with brand new special effects, environments, and weapons (like the assault rifle, bazooka, and flamethrower) to aid them in 18 diverse missions.
title: Army Men: Sarge's Heroes 2

description: Fallout Tactics: Brotherhood of Steel is a squad-based, third-person tactical combat game. Set in the post-apocalyptic world of the award-winning Fallout universe, players join in the Brotherhood of Steel as they travel through 20 tactical missions, attempting to overcome a powerful new enemy. Players will work toward developing their squads' specialized skills and improve their stats as they utilize squad-based skirmish techniques to survive battles. In multiplayer mode, 36 characters can be onscreen at one time with up to 18 gamers playing at once.
title: Fallout Tactics: Brotherhood of Steel

description: The Pokemon wagon keeps rolling with Stadium 2, the follow-up (of sorts) to the smash success Stadium. Like Stadium before it, part two offers Pokemaniacs everywhere a chance to duel with the monsters they've been so carefully preening in the Game Boy Pokemon Gold and Silver games. Using the Transfer Pak to great effect, Stadium 2 allows users to upload Pokemon from their Game Boy cartridges and battle them in several scenarios. There are literally thousands of battles to be had in Stadium 2. Where Stadium had three Stadium Cups, Stadium 2 has four, and two of those are separated into four eight-trainer battles each. In addition, a Pokemon Academy has been added to the fun. Here, players can access a huge database of Pokemon information, participate in classes and ultimately take tests on what they've learned. The mini-games are back, as is the ability to play your Game Boy carts onscreen at Game Boy Tower.
title: Pokemon Stadium 2

description:
Take control of a fully armed prototype mechanized robot and fight off enemies during a space colony hijack in Hideo Kojima's

. In it, players become the character Leo Stenbuck, who sees the consequences of fighting first hand as he learns the true meaning of life and death. Combining state of the art PlayStation 2 graphics, tons of weapons, and an involving storyline,

also provides a dynamically changing mission structure, a versus mode for two players, and a playable demo of

in all first-run production copies.
title: Zone of the Enders

description: Start in the 15th century and sail your way through 500 years of exploration! Lead a European nation through its age of discovery, engaging real world leaders and historical figures in your missions. You decide whether you'd like to command the Dutch, English, French, Spanish, Russians, or any of several other countries in this 2D epic. Packed with real-time strategy, the game requires constant attention to detail on your part, putting your exploration skills to the test. Up to eight players can get in on the fun via a LAN or Internet connection.
title: Europa Universalis

description:
In the time of a nightmare inquisition, the disgraced captain of the guard, Alleron stands accused of necromancy -- witchcraft in its darkest form. Thrown into the Pit of the Accused, Alleron must use his enchanted mask and its powers to help him survive the evils that lay before him in the darkened abyss; and perhaps to achieve something even greater. And so begins

; yet another installment of the long-storied fantasy franchise from 3DO. Features for the PlayStation 2 version include: nine new worlds with 20 different levels, 30 unique monster classes and enemies, dozens of various weapon and armor types, and a wide variety of NPCs with an enhanced scripting AI that's used to advance the storyline.
title: Warriors of Might and Magic

publisher: Gathering of Developers (aka GOD Games), Take-Two Interactive
description:
Terminal Reality's first PlayStation 2 game, 4x4 Evolution is an enhanced version of the original Dreamcast title. Extra lighting effects and more cars are among the new additions.

Experience four-wheeling mayhem as you battle opponents through fifteen different courses. Customize your own trucks and SUVs to be able to cut corners, grab massive air, and create your own shortcuts.
title: 4x4 EVO

description: Created in a covert labotatory by splicing DNA from the Green Army's strongest and most skilled soldiers, the "Omega Soldier" is the Tan army's worst high-tech threat. Army Men: Green Rogue incorporates a 3rd person shooter with a coin-op, shoot'em up style of gameplay that will raise the heartbeat of anyone who dares to accept the challenge.
title: Army Men: Green Rogue

description:
Acclaim swings for the fences in its first PlayStation 2 hardball title,

. Boasting all 30 major league teams and over 700 players,

also includes an award-winning lineup of hall of famers, audio commentary by Bob Brenly and Thom Brennaman, and the ability to play with classic uniforms. Additionally,

features over 130 unique batting stances, 50 pitching deliveries, 1500 motion-captured animations, and realistic season awards for MVP, Cy Young, Rookie of the Year, and Gold Glove winners. Players can even select from seven different camera angles and create their very own dream teams thanks to the incredibly robust General Manager mode.
title: All-Star Baseball 2002

description: Star Wars: Battle for Naboo is a popular flight action game. Players leap into a variety of vehicles and traverse a wide range of environments while clashing with numerous Trade Federation enemies, such as battle droids, droid starfighters and AAT's in more than fifteen compelling levels. Experience new and familiar Star Wars locations while engaging in air-to-air, ground-to-ground, space and air-to-ground battles.
title: Star Wars: Battle for Naboo

description:
One of the PS2's first RPGs,

is a title that challenges players to not only strategise, battle and solve puzzles, but also to create geographical landscapes using the new Georama system. Gamers assume the role of a young boy named Toran on an unforgettable journey of rebirth, revival and hope. Unfortunately an evil demon spirit has been released and has left destruction in its wake and Toran must harness the spirit of those destroyed to rebuild the lands in time for an epic confrontation. True to life graphics should mesmerise gamers as they create villages complete with houses, hills, churches, volcanoes, and streams; they'll even be able to control the weather!
title: Dark Cloud

description:
Heart of Winter is an expansion pack for Icewind Dale that is expected to add an additional 15-25 hours of gameplay. The adventures take you to  the small fishing village Lonelywood, which has been beseiged barbarians.  The expansion removes the experience cap so characters can attain 30th level, and offers sixty new spells and over one hundread new magic items. Some improvements to the interface include support for 800 x 600 resolution, drop away interface panels, gem bags, and scroll cases. Based on the logo, a white dragon might be in the game.

Black Isle Studios has released a free, downloadable (72 MB), add-in adventure for Heart of Winter called Trials of the Luremaster.
title: Icewind Dale: Heart of Winter
rating_content: Animated Blood, Mild Language, Use of Alcohol and Tobacco

description: Buckle up - it's sheer asphalt anarchy! Crazy Taxi screeches onto the PlayStation 2 with one wild and hilarious jaunt. As a fearless cabbie with attitude, your goal is to rack up the mega-bucks before your shift ends. It's a race against the clock as you pick up passengers and peel rubber through busy streets and back alleys to their various destinations. To keep that meter collecting cash, you've gotta take the fastest route possible, even if it means bending the traffic laws - just a little. So get a grip on the wheel, sharpen your senses, and don't lose your cool.
title: Crazy Taxi
platforms: PS2 PC Arcade GCN PS3 Xbox 360 Cell iPhone DC

description: Can you deliver your passengers to their destinations in record time? If you want to make any money, you'd better be quick on the draw in this inventive sequel. Taking place in New York City, CRAZY TAXI 2 stars four new drivers: Hot-D, Slash, Iceman, and Cinnamon. Each driver has a unique personality and driving style, making for extremely varied gameplay. The taxis are each outfitted with hydraulics this time out, allowing you to hop over anything that gets in your way.
title: Crazy Taxi 2

description:
In

, players find themselves in the middle of a rebellion on the hostile surface of Mars fighting for their freedom against the evil Ultor Corporation. Featuring a sophisticated physics engine, five fully controllable vehicles, a variety of unique natural environments, and Volition's proprietary Geo-Mod Technology,

is one of the most advanced second-generation titles ever released for the PlayStation 2. Geo-Mod technology supports the real time, arbitrary modification of the geometry that makes up the game's environment. This means that players have the full ability to destroy whatever they want. Just point a weapon at an object or structure and shoot -- total destruction always follows.
title: Red Faction
platforms: PS2 PS4 NNG Mac PC Cell

description: The moon project is a sequel to the real time strategy game, Earth 2150. The Moon project adds brand new units, weapons, and technologies such as submarines, earthquakes generators and artillery. The UCS and the LC go head-to-head in a completely new game environment.
title: The Moon Project

description: With the wicked Jafar's awful attacks finally over and done with, the people of Agrabah were finally beginning to feel safe again. Just when the coast seemed clear, however, Jafar's Twin sister, Nasira, declared revenge for the defeat of her brother. Now, it's up to Aladdin to free his friends, Princess Jasmine and the Sultan, from a deadly spell before time runs out. Unfortunately, that's not going to be so easy. Capturing the same ancient relics that unfortunately will free the evil Jafar can only break the spell that Nasira has cast! Filled with action-packed levels and tough-as-nails enemies, NASIRA'S REVENGE is based on Disney's popular ALADDIN films. You'll find yourself swinging on vines, taking magic carpet rides, trying out a host of mini-games, and using an interesting assortment of weaponry (everything from apples to fire daggers) before all is said and done on this detailed homage to a time-loved story.
title: Aladdin in Nasira's Revenge

description: Play the role of a deity in a land where the surroundings are yours to shape and its people are yours to lord over. Be an evil, malevolent god and the natives will worship you with fear in their eyes. Play as a kind, benevolent god and they will worship you with love in their hearts. Your actions decide whether you create a heaven or hell for your worshipers. Then select a creature from the land to act as your representative in the world. Raise it to gigantic proportions and teach it to do your bidding--whether the animal grows into an evil colossus of mass destruction or a kind and gentle giant is up to you. Progress through the game's rich storyline performing powerful miracles to battle other deities and become the world's supreme god.
title: Black & White
Triple Play Baseball
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description: Enter a world of action-packed, sword swinging fantasy in RECORD OF LODOSS WAR from Conspiracy Games. Based on the anime and comic book series by Kadokawa Shoten, LODOSS WAR is a hack-and-slash role-playing affair that will keep you glued to your Dreamcast through more than 40 hours of dungeon-crawling, monster-slicing exploration. You play as the hero (you decide on your character's name), who has just been brought back to life by the powerful wizard Wart. Your quest is to save the land of Marmo and stop the resurrection of the nefarious Goddess Cardice. Play ensues in an isometric view much like DIABLO, but the detailed graphics and 3D battles take place in real-time, requiring quick strategic combat skills. Dice your way through ogres, goblins, skeletons, bats, and more using upgradable swords or flesh-zapping magic spells. Collect valuable Mithrill and use it as currency to have the dwarf blacksmith enhance your weapons and armor. The rich, engaging world in RECORD OF LODOSS WAR is bursting with drama and danger.
title: Record of Lodoss War

description: Rooooooolling Staaaaart!" Thus went the memorable, distinctly humorous cry that signaled the beginning of a race in Sega's 1994 arcade smash, Daytona USA. Soon, you'll be able to hear it once again from the comfort of your couch or easy chair. Daytona USA takes advantage of every ounce of the Dreamcast's power, bringing us the better-than-perfect arcade translation that just couldn't be done on the Saturn. Daytona fans rejoice; the game you've been waiting for is finally here.
title: Daytona USA
platforms: DC Xbox 360 PS3 Saturn Arcade PC

description:
Leaving your beloved Mina behind for a spell, you'll trek out to the darkest regions of the globe to track down your nemesis: Count Dracula. Playing as Jonathan Harker (the protagonist from Bram Stoker's original novel), you'll travel in 1904 through London, Carfax, the Borgo Pass, and beyond in an attempt to find the world-famous bloodsucker. Your journey will take you to a series of catacombs, where you'll finally meet up with the Count, himself.

The sequel to the Dracula: Resurrection game brings an even scarier adventure. Find the secret of how to vanquish the Prince of Darkness and his Black Guard before they destroy you. Dracula 2: The Last Sanctuary revives some of the original characters and the novelist's spirit, to create a convincing sequel. Solve riddles through exploring and decision-making.
title: Dracula: The Last Sanctuary

description: is an epic saga of 16th century Japan inspired by the battle scenes of famed Japanese director Akira Kurosawa. It takes place in a world of darkness and magic when power hungry warlords battle for control of Feudal Japan. One brave Samurai, Samanosuke Akechi, boldly volunteers to rescue the kidnapped princess Yuki, but does not fully realize the desperation of this mission. An entire legion of demon warriors stands between him and his mission to avenge the princess.
title: Onimusha: Warlords

description: The Batman returns on Game Boy Color with BATMAN: Total Chaos in Gotham City. Based on the popular animated BATMAN series, this single-player action game allows you to don the cowl of one of two Bat-heroes: Batman or Batgirl. Some of the Dark Knight's famous arch-villains have escaped and are causing serious trouble in Gotham, and it's up to you to put them back where they belong. Everyone from Poison Ivy to the Clown Prince of Crime the Joker himself is here to wreak havoc and keep the caped crusader busy. Grab your utility belt and assault 18 stages of varied action that take you on a tour of Gotham City. Much of the action is played from a side-scrolling perspective, but some levels have you taking out the Batmobile or the Batcycle in overhead high-speed excitement. Naturally, Batman and Batgirl are both packing their usual assortment of weapons and tools including the Batarang, the grappling hook, smoke bombs, and more. BATMAN: Total Chaos in Gotham City is only compatible with Game Boy Color.
title: Batman: Chaos in Gotham

description: It's a good ol' fashioned, no-holds-barred Springfield Brouhaha! Get ready for Squishee-throwin', tendon twistin', Duff Cloud burpin' action as all your favorite characters battle through the Springfield Circuit to win the ultimate title!
title: The Simpsons Wrestling
rating_content: Animated Violence, Comic Mischief, Suggestive Themes

description: If you watched cartoons in the early ¿80s, chances are you caught a glimpse of those little blue characters known as the SMURFS. After taking a break in the ¿90s, they're back again with their own game for the PlayStation called SMURF RACER. While you always knew these guys were cute, you probably didn't know that they like to drive fast. You can choose from eight Smurf drivers, each with an arsenal of hilarious weapons to take out the competition. Racing on 11 distinct tracks, you'll speed your way through five cool Smurf environments that will challenge your driving skills while also making you laugh. If you're feeling particularly wacky, take on a friend in awesome two-player action. With SMURF RACER, it's "On your mark, get set, Smurf!"
title: Smurf Racer

description: Play the role of Jean-Luc Couger, a special operative for an independent goverment agency called S.C.A.T.  (Strategic Covert Actions Team).  A terrorist group called the Crying Lions has infiltrated the high-security complex that houses the GULF Strategic Weapons System, a high-tech satellite with laser capabilities.  They have already destroyed the Center for Space Research, and their leader has announced that they have no demands - the main agenda is destruction.  The GULF system needs from 3 to 4 hours to power up before the next blast, so Jean-Luc and the other operatives have just about 3 hours in which to accomplish the impossible - take back control of the GULF complex, or disable it so that the terrorists may not make use of it.
title: WinBack: Covert Operations

description: When a terrorist organization called Agares takes over a weapons satellite, an elite team known as the Confidential Mission Forces is sent in to set things straight and you're on the team. Straight from the floors of the arcade comes this light-gun shooter that spans three massive locations. Each exotic setting will test your smarts and skills, and there's a comprehensive Training mode to get you up to speed. If you're good enough, you might be able to unlock the secret mode called Another World. You'll begin in a museum, blasting terrorists and building guards who are trying to stop you from getting to a stolen satellite disk. Then, see if you can rescue a programmer who's been kidnapped aboard a train, eventually ending up on Agares' terrorist-riddled submarine for a final showdown. Fans of the James Bond books, films, and games will slip right into the counterspy-themed story and gameplay of this white-knuckle adventure.
title: Confidential Mission

description:
Featuring an enhanced version of the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater game engine, Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX is the most cutting edge and authentic freestlye BMX gaming experience ever!

Ride like ten-time World Vert Champion Mat Hoffman or seven other top BMX Pros while pulling off hundreds of combinations of tricks and pro signature moves in realistic Street, Vert, and Dirt courses.

With innovative game features, realistic BMX physics, a pumping alternative soundtrack, detailed graphics and intuitive controls, Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX? is the ultimate BMX experience!
title: Mat Hoffman's Pro BMX

description: Simultaneously released with Oracle of Ages, this second Capcom-developed Zelda game is widely regarded as the more difficult of the two adventures, Oracle of Ages sees Link embark on a similar quest to that in Oracle of Seasons, in that he must rescue a beautiful woman from the clutches of an unspeakable evil. Link's adventure begins when he awakens in a strange forest deep within the land of Labrynna. By using the Harp of Ages, Link is able to transcend the very fabric of time, allowing him to jump between the past and present as the need arises. Complete the adventure to receive a password that can be used in Oracle of Seasons.
title: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence

description: Game Boy Color entry into the series, coded by Capcom. Taking place in the world of Holodrum, far removed from the land of Hyrule, Link must embark on a quest that will see him traverse the land in its entirety in search of the Oracle of Seasons. By obtaining the Rod of Seasons, Link is able to manipulate the seasons by waving the wand atop any nearby tree stump. The landscape changes with each season, and though trees will be in full bloom in summer, during the winter months they'll lose their leaves, enabling Link to squeeze past them and enter new areas. Simultaneously released with Oracle of Ages, the two games are interconnected via a password feature.
title: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Seasons
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence

description: The official Star Trek: Voyager Elite Force add-on pack offers players the ability to explore an interactive 3D recreation of Voyager's interior in Tour Mode.  Once aboard, players will have unrestricted access to 15 decks of the ship.  Players can perform complex tasks like initiating Voyager's self-destruct sequence or shutting down the warp core, along with finding secret items hidden objectives, and mini-games.  Once players finish touring the ship, they can hone their Hazard Team skills in two new single player campaigns -- a Captain Proton holo-novel and an assault on a Klingon compound.
title: Star Trek: Voyager: Elite Force -- Expansion Pack

description: You can do two main things in the game: build robots and fight with the robots you have made. You can only work with one robot at a time, but you can build and save as many bots as you like. In the Bot Lab, you choose from various chassis types, armor, mobility, weaponry, and accessories to assemble your robot. Each component has various properties such as weight, energy required, strength, and damage abilities. Once you've built your robot, you can take it into the arena to fight against an opponent. The game allows you to play several types of matches: a practice session, which is to help you learn to play without risking damage to your newly created bot; a tournament match, in which you fight against a series of computer opponents for the championship title; a custom challenge, where you can make wagers against computer players in non-tournament matches; and multiplayer mode, where you can fight against your brother, friend, uncle, dentist, etc. over a local network or the Internet.
title: Robot Arena

description: Merchant Prince II is a turn-based strategy game of economic, political, and military conquest. Venture deep into the heart of the Renaissance, a time when valiant traders braved storms, pirates, and disease to amass fortunes. Chart the treacherous Atlantic and overcome the desert heat, bringing untold wealth back from the four corners of the Earth. Join in the vicious politics, bribing senators, buying cardinals, and seizing offices ranging from General of the Venetian Home Army to the Pope himself! Venice stands on the brink of greatness.
title: Merchant Prince II

description: Players will enjoy puzzling challenges like they've never seen before in this unique party game for the whole family. For the first time in an Action/Platformer, both characters must work cooperatively to help each other through every trap, over each obstacle, and past some very hungry critters that would love to have them for dinner!
title: The Adventures of Cookie & Cream

description: Rumble Racing is muscle car mayhem for the next millennium. Take a custom ride to the limit and beyond with big air, power-ups, tricks, and superfast racing for the Rumble championship. Unlock new locales and new tracks as you blast the accelerator and leave the earth behind! Put the hammer down and power to the finish line in Rumble Racing!
title: Rumble Racing

description: Halloween becomes a year-round treat with THE SIMPSONS: Night of the Living Treehouse of Horror. Based on the annual SIMPSONS Halloween specials, this lighthearted game allows you to play as anyone in the family: Bart, Lisa, Homer, Marge, or little Maggie. Each character has been drawn into a haunted world, and it's up to you to steer them home. There are six spooky levels in all, and each one of them is packed with chills and challenges for gamers of all ages. SIMPSONS aficionados are sure to get a kick out of all the cameos Principal Skinner, Krusty the Clown, Moe the Bartender, Barney, and plenty of others make appearances. The game successfully marries the hilarious antics of the Springfield regulars with some surprisingly exciting gameplay to yield a game that's as much fun to play as a SIMPSONS episode is to watch. You don't have to be a total series addict to get into this rollicking gem.
title: The Simpsons:  Night of the Living Treehouse of Horror
rating_content: Animated Violence, Comic Mischief, Mild Animated Violence

description:
The first soccer game created by Konami's Hawaiian studio,

brings the ESPN and Major League Soccer licenses home to the PlayStation 2. Once underway, players will experience diving headers, vicious slide tackles, and sprawling goalie saves with additional featurse that include: all 12 MLS professional teams and two all-star squads, 53 international teams, multiple play modes and options, MLS-specific stadiums and uniforms, 12 different scenarios, and authentic MLS player facial textures. Contrary to popular belief,

is not the U.S. version of

and

; but rather, an all-new game built from the ground up using the same engine originally created by Konami Osaka.
title: ESPN MLS Extra Time

description: A variety of little animals take center stage in this racing challenge that takes you through some unlikely environments. Trek through the living room, Grandma's house, a bedroom, and the garage in your quest for glorious victory. There are 25 missions in all, and the action is spread over 10 huge levels. You choose to play as Chris (a cat) or Betty (a little bird), and then take your character through a slew of puzzles, avoiding hazards and collecting power-ups. Finding the appropriate items will allow you to jump across furniture, shrink your car, or even climb over your obstacles. Smart strategy and quick reflexes will help you unlock an extremely trying boss level where you'll take on either a cat or bird in a head-to-head duel. Sometimes the best things come in small packages, and that's certainly the case in this small-scale racing challenge for the Game Boy Color.
title: Racin' Ratz

description: Fans of Disney or Pixar's TOY STORY will love settling in to hours of racing fun with their favorite characters from the animated film. Play as any of a dozen characters including Buzz, Woody, Hamm, and others as you try to reach maximum speed and take the checkered flag. Each of the personalities has a unique driving style and vehicle, making for very wild racing. You'll get to revisit lots of your favorite locales from the original TOY STORY, traveling to 18 different tracks in all. There are plenty of surprise pick-ups to keep you laughing, and the game boasts an advanced AI system that ensures a very challenging experience. In fact, the computer opponents will adjust to your proven skill level, which means there'll never be an easy race! In addition to the racing, there are plenty of character-based challenges that allow you to unlock secret items. Both challenging and accessible, TOY STORY RACER is fun for the whole family.
title: Toy Story Racer

description: The most popular Major League Baseball series ever trots on in to the PlayStation 2 in its most compete form to date. Fans of the long-running TRIPLE PLAY series will recognize the three main modes: Single Game, Season, and Playoffs. The PS2 entry, however, showcases advanced defensive intelligence, brand-new field effects, and an overhaul of pitcher and batter interfaces making for some extremely lifelike ball. All of the real MLB players and franchises (including up-to-date stadiums) are in attendance, and the facial textures come from 150 real MLB players. The creators have also built new stadium sounds and celebrations from the crowd to closely re-create the real ballpark experience. Sean McDonough and commentator-turned-manager Buck Martinez provide the complete play-by-play, and there are even scripted animations for arguments with the umps. Those looking for offbeat thrills will appreciate the inclusion of a 12-player Big League Challenge at Las Vegas' Cashman Field.
title: Triple Play Baseball

description:
The Skaarj war is over, but fighting between the different factions and the mysterious and bloodthirsty Phayder are escalating. A Tournament is held to officialize and contain competition; soon, this turns from a few gladiatorial combats between convicts into major public events and the biggest source of income for Liandri Corporation. Several factions will be competing in this year's tournament, each with their motives: you are a member of one of them, and must prove to be worthy of facing Xan Kriegor himself, mastering many weapons at your disposal, and confronting the most powerful computer AI to date - or your friends in multiplayer mode.

The hit PC game comes alive on the Dreamcast with 20 new official maps and on-line support. Play against up to seven other people either over your Dreamcast modem or broadband adapter in one of the best FPS ever seen.
title: Unreal Tournament [1999]
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

description: Summoner isn't your ordinary fantasy role-playing game. Yet, Summoner is a dark fantasy role-playing game with an original way of combat and fighting styles by summoning creatures and demons to your aid, and an in-depth, dramatic storyline that has "sleeper-hit" written all over it. As a child, Joseph, the main character, tried to save his village from attackers, but the demon he summoned slaughtered the villagers while Joseph watched in horror, his misguided heroics causing the deaths of those he loved. Exiled, Joseph vowed never to summon again. As years passed, the Yago councils give him little choice but to go on a quest for the ancient Summoner's rings to prevent a war to erupt. Notable features include a full 3D engine with a 3rd person view, a dynamic, easy to control camera system offering cinematic views, an easy-to-learn combat system, amazing in-game cinematics, massive amounts of weapons, spells, monsters, and characters, and a quality party-based multiplayer mode, unconstrained by the storyline.
title: Summoner

description:
In

join forces with the leader of Alpha Wolf Squadron, Capt. William Blade as he battles Plastro's air force, which is led by ace pilot Baron von Beige. As gamers battle through 22 missions, they'll encounter environments like the Japanese garden, Halloween night, and the Wild West. Choppers include King Cobra, Chinook, Osprey, and Apache types, each of which has its own unique weapons and advantages. As an added bonus, there's a plastic-collection system that unlocks secret toy abilities and hidden chopper weaponry, as well as real-time cutscenes, in-game voice-overs, and cinematic sequences that keep players in the action at all times. There are even two-player head-to-head and cooperative missions in

several multiplayer modes.
title: Army Men: Air Attack 2

description: Push yourself to the limit as a new driver for Ford Racing. Sit in the driver?s seat of 12 different Ford cars, ranging from race-tuned showroom vehicles such as the F series, or the Mustang, to the pure race Taurus, the star of the NASCAR?circuit and the concept cars such as the GT90. Compete in five different race classes, earning respect and unlocking other vehicles and tracks as you move up the ranks. Battle against other drivers in three championships and be rewarded with new cars to add to your garage, and trophies for your living room or mantle.
title: Ford Racing

description: Jinkies! Join up with the entire gang of meddling kids (Shaggy, Scooby, Fred, Daphne, and Velma) as you try to crack three separate mysteries each based on classic episodes of the beloved cartoon program. Taking the TV episodes "What a Night for a Knight," "That's Snow Ghost," and "A Tiki Scare is No Fair," the game runs the three stories together with a unifying plotline. You play as Shaggy, trudging through haunted forests, creepy basements, and abandoned buildings with your trusty pal, Scoob. Rather than having a "death" meter, as in most games of its kind, SCOOBY-DOO: Classic Creep Capers has a courage meter Scoob and Shag flee the scene if they get too scared. There are plenty of clues hidden throughout the game's expansive levels, but if you're not careful the bad guys might get to you before you can solve the mysteries. While the game certainly offers something for nostalgic fans of the series, it's a hilarious, original take that will keep gamers challenged as well.
title: Scooby-Doo: Classic Creep Capers

description: ESPN National Hockey Night features total ESPN integration with 800 fluid motion-captured animations and eye-popping visuals inspired by the world's largest sports network. Officially licensed by the NHL and NHLPA, Hockey Night also boasts all the authentic uniforms (including those of the Columbus Blue Jackets and Minnesota Wild), an extensive create-a-player option, multiple game modes including exhibition, season, and playoffs, and play-by-play commentary from renowned ESPN announcers Gary Thorne and Steve Levy. Endorsed by Washington Capitals star Jaromir Jagr, National Hockey Night also utilizes realistic player physics, state-of-the art stadium recreations, and all the little nuances that make the NHL what it is.
title: ESPN National Hockey Night
platforms: PS2 GBC SNES Gen Sega-CD PC

description: Gauntlet Dark Legacy is the all-new 3D iteration in the time-honored "hack'n'slash" classic Gauntlet franchise. The revolutionary Gauntlet game design allows you to work in a team and venture through eight dangerous worlds. One to four players can select one of eight different characters. Using force of arms and exotic magical powers, you vanquish creatures, search for treasure, evade traps, and embark on quests.
title: Gauntlet: Dark Legacy
platforms: PS2 GCN Xbox Arcade GBC GBA
rating_content: Animated Violence, Realistic Blood, Realistic Violence

description: MYST III: EXILE introduces a new villain who seeks revenge when he finds out his homeland was destroyed by Atrus' sons. The player must track the villain through several surrealistic Ages, navigating puzzles to uncover the truth behind this new adversary. Only then can disaster be averted to choose who was right and who was wrong. The villian is played by Academy Award nominee Brad Dourif (One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest).
title: Myst III: Exile

description:
As the newly installed dictator of an obscure Caribbean island, build a path of progress for a nation mired in poverty, civil unrest and infighting. Oh, and uhh... stash a few million in your Swiss bank account just in case you need to take early retirement.

Tropico takes the addictive building-oriented gameplay of hits such as SimCity 3000 and Railroad Tycoon 2, combined with a healthy dose of Latin American political intrigue, and bundles it up in an easy-to-learn, hard to master, utterly addictive package.
title: Tropico

description: Travel back to the island where it all started, collecting electronic pets and training them to be mighty warriors. An entirely new battle system makes for the most realistic combat in series history, and the improved graphics and intense sound deliver you right to the heart of the tournament. Individual monster control allows you to have maximum influence over the story's outcome, and more than 100 new creatures are available for capture in this impressive sequel to the acclaimed Digimon World. The action is fast and furious, as you enter into battle against some of the most gruesome machines imaginable! This time around, you can actually gain a bit of an advantage by melding two Digimon together to create an entirely new creature. With more than 200 monsters to capture and train, the game ensures that you'll be at it for a while before the excitement dies down. Play alone or take on a friend.
title: Digimon World 2

description: The Green and Tan armies make another appearance on the Game Boy Color. This time they've taken to the air in ARMY MEN: Air Combat. You can take control of three different helicopters and melt your enemies with a full arsenal of pyrotechnic weaponry. Try to master 16 missions with varied objectives such as escort duty, search and rescue, delivery missions, and bombing runs. All of these missions take place in treacherous environments like beaches, playgrounds, picnic areas, and the backyard. Throughout the game you will have to keep an eye out for the Tan army as well as bees, ants, and out of control RC cars. The men may be plastic, but the combat is real in ARMY MEN: Air Combat.
title: Army Men Air Combat [GBC]

description: The hormones are running wild in PROJECT JUSTICE, the Dreamcast follow up to the fighting mayhem introduced with RIVAL SCHOOLS. Six new fighters join the original 16 teens; each team of three represents their own school in combat. Enter the story mode by choosing your favorite team and helping them beat the tar out of every other school's representatives. Each team's story is a little different, and the events that take place between fights will tell you everything you need to know about their reasons for fighting. These teams will work together in order to win a fight, too you'll see some of the wildest tag-team moves you've ever witnessed. If you're just looking for a quick round of mano-a-mano with the computer or against a friend, the Free Fighting mode will let you work out your frustrations with a team of your favorite fighters.
title: Project Justice

description: Rune: Halls of Valhalla is the expansion pack for the successful Viking third-person game, Rune. The expansion pack is a both a stand alone AND an expansion game for Rune, adding 33 new maps, lots of new characters, and new game modes such as Arena and Headball.
title: Rune: Halls of Valhalla

description: MTV Sports? T.J. Lavin?s Ultimate BMX?takes the hottest action sport around and puts it to a video game.  Control one of ten professional BMX riders?including two time X-games BMX dirt champion TJ Lavin?and attempt to become the undisputed BMX champion in three distinct disciplines: dirt, vert, and street.  Test your skills mastering more than 50 separate land and air tricks-- including tailwhips, crooked grinds, 720?s, and more-- as you progress through a series of competitions.  If you?re good enough, you just might get a sponsor and be invited to the ultimate challenge: The MTV BMX Competition, a course where all three disciplines are rolled into one!  Of course, if you?ve mastered the one-player game, you can always go head-to-head with a friend in one of the many multi-player modes. With real BMX sponsors, upgradeable equipment, and riding environments that change in difficulty as you progress?this game has got it all.  Put all this to some of today?s hottest music and you?ve got a title that?s tough to beat!
title: MTV Sports: T.J. Lavin's Ultimate BMX

description: If you're looking for that rush of nostalgia that only 2D-scrolling shooters like GALAGA and GRADIUS can bring, then MARS MATRIX from Capcom may be the game for you. The year is 2309, and a Martian colony has revolted against Earth's government. You are a member of Earth's Defense Force and have been sent to the Red planet to quell the Martian rebellion. You'll have to pilot your Mosquito ship in a solo battle against waves of enemies in your frantic bid for survival. Fly as fast as you can, zipping in front of and behind backgrounds and buildings as the colorful but deadly projectiles rain down on your ever-changing position. Fly quickly and grab valuable power-ups that will upgrade your craft's standard weapon. You also have your handy pulse cannon and powerful Mosquito attack to assist you; the Mosquito attack sucks up all enemy bullets on-screen and spits them back out in an opponent-blasting explosion. The graphics in MARS MATRIX are bright, well-animated 2D sprites that look good (albeit in an old-style manner) and help to keep the pace blistering without any pesky slowdown.
